34Na aber a Esau dzii mfe eduanan no, ɔwaar Hetnyi Beeri ne babaa Judit, nye Hetnyi Elon ne babaa Basemat: 35na wɔyɛɛ ma Isaak nye Rebeka dzi awerɛhow.

Title: GYENESIS 27
Content:
Jakob Wia Esau Ne Nhyira
1Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Isaak yɛɛ akɔdaa, na n’enyi do yɛɛ no kusukusu, na onnhu adze yie no, ɔsomaa frɛɛ ne ba panyin Esau, na ɔsee no dɛ, Me ba: na ɔgyee no do dɛ, Egya Emi nye yi. 2Na ɔsee dɛ, Afei hwɛ, mayɛ akɔdaa, minnyim mo wu da. 3Dɛm ntsi afei, meserɛ wo, fa w’ahayɛdze, w’egyen kotoku nye w’egyen, na kɔ hamu kɛfa hanam brɛ me; 4na yɛ me edziban a ɔyɛ huam, dɛ mbrɛ mepɛ, na fa brɛ me, ma mindzi; na me kra nhyira wo ana mewu. 5Na aber a Isaak rekasa kyerɛ ne ba Esau no, Rebeka tsee. Na Esau kɔr hamu dɛ orukoku abowa, na ɔdze aba no. 6Rebeka kaa kyerɛɛ ne ba Jakob dɛ, Hwɛ, metsee dɛ w’egya reka kyerɛ wo nua Esau dɛ, 7Kɛfa hanam brɛ me, na yɛ me edziban a ɔyɛ huam, ma mindzi, na minhyira wo wɔ EWURADZE enyim ansaana mewu. 8Dɛm ntsi afei, me ba, tsie me ndze dɛ mbrɛ merehyɛ wo yi ara. 9Kɔ mpɔnkyebuw no mu, na kɛkyer mpɔnkyemba a woye ebien wɔ hɔ brɛ me: na medze bɛyɛ edziban a ɔyɛ huam ama w’egya, dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ: 10na edze akɛma no, ama oedzi, na oeehyira wo ansaana oewu. 11Na Jakob see ne na Rebeka dɛ, Hwɛ, mo nua Esau no ho wɔ nhwi, na emi mo ho yɛ monomonom. 12Bi a m’egya bɛkeka mo ho ahwɛ, na mebɛyɛ n’enyi do dɛ ɔdaadaafo; na medze mpaa mebɛba mo do, na nnyɛ nhyira a. 13Na ne na see no dɛ, Wo mpaama mbra mo do, me ba: ɔwo tsie me ndze ara, na kɔ kɛfa hɔn brɛ me. 14Na ɔkɔree kɛfae, na ɔdze brɛɛ ne na: na ne na ɔdze yɛɛ edziban a ɔyɛ huam, dɛ mbrɛ n’egya pɛ. 15Na Rebeka faa ne ba panyin Esau ne ntar fɛɛfɛw a ɔwɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ fie no bi na ɔdze hyɛɛ ne ba kuma Jakob: 16na ɔdze mpɔnkyemba no hɔn nwoma duraduraa ne nsa ho nye no kɔn monomonom no ho: 17na ɔdze edziban a ɔyɛ huam no nye boodoo a woesiesie no dze hyɛɛ ne ba Jakob nsa. 18Na ɔbaa n’egya hɔ, na ɔfrɛɛ no dɛ, M’egya: na ɔsee dɛ, Emi nye yi. Woana nye wo, me ba? 19Na Jakob see n’egya dɛ, Emi nye w’abakan Esau; mayɛ dɛ mbrɛ ekyerɛɛ me no: soɛr meserɛ wo, tsena hɔ na dzi me hanam yi bi, ama wo kra eehyira me. 20Na Isaak bisaa ne ba no dɛ, ɔyɛ dɛn ma wo nsa kaa no ntsɛm dɛm, me ba? Na obuaa dɛ, Osiandɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn maa mihyiaa yie. 21Na Isaak see Jakob dɛ, Pin ha, meserɛ wo, ma menkeka wo monhwɛ, me ba, kyerɛ dɛ me ba Esau noara nye wo anaa. 22Na Jakob piin n’egya Isaak nkyɛn; na ɔkekaa no ho hwɛe, na ɔsee dɛ, Ndze no yɛ Jakob ne ndze, na nsa no na ɔyɛ Esau ne nsa. 23Na oennhu no, osiandɛ ne nsa ho wɔ nhwi, dɛ mbrɛ no nua Esau ne nsa ho tse: nna ohyiraa no. 24Na obisaa dɛ, Ana ɔwo nye me ba Esau ara? Na ɔsee dɛ, Emi nye no. 25Na ɔsee dɛ, Fa pin me nkyɛn, ma mindzi me ba ne hanam yi bi, ma me kra nhyira wo. Na ɔdze piin ne nkyɛn, ma odzii: na ɔdze nsa brɛɛ no, ma ɔnomee. 26Na n’egya Isaak see no dɛ, Afei pin ha, na bɛfew m’ano, me ba. 27 Na ɔtwee pinii feew n’ano: na Isaak ohuaa n’atar no huam, na ohyiraa no, na ɔsee dɛ,
Hwɛ, me ba ho hua
Tse dɛ haban a EWURADZE ehyira do no mu hua:
28Na Nyankopɔn mma wo sor bɔsu bi,
Nye asaase ne seradze bi,
Nye eburow nye nsa pii:
29 Aman nsom wo,
Na amanaman nkotow wo:
Yɛ wo nuanom do wura,
Na wo na mba nkotow wo:
Ndom nka hɔn a wɔdom wo nyinara,
Na nhyira nka hɔn a wohyira wo nyinara.
Esau Bisa Nhyira
30Na ɔbaa dɛ, Isaak wiee Jakob nhyira no, na Jakob fii n’egya nkyɛn firii ara pɛ nna no nua Esau fi n’ahayɛ baa fie. 31Na ɔno so yɛɛ edziban a ɔyɛ huam, na ɔdze brɛɛ n’egya; na ɔsee n’egya dɛ, Wɔmma m’egya nsoɛr, na ondzi ne ba ne hanam yi bi, ma ne kra nhyira me 32Na n’egya Isaak bisaa no dɛ, Woana nye wo? Na ɔsee no dɛ, Mara wo ba, w’abakan Esau a. 33Na Isaak no ho popoo kɛsenara, na ɔsee dɛ, Woana mbɔ na ɔakɛfa hanam, na ɔdze abrɛ me, ma medzi ne nyinara bi ansaana ereba, na mehyira no yi? Ampa, mehyiraa no. 34Aber a Esau tsee n’egya ne nsɛm no, osuu su kɛse a ɔyɛ wen, na ɔsee n’egya dɛ, Hyira mo so, mo so bi, ao m’egya. 35Na ɔsee dɛ, Wo nua dze ndaadaa aba abɛgye wo nhyira kɔ. 36 Na Esau see dɛ, Ana ɔno wɔmmfrɛ no Jakob bi? Iyi ka ho a oedzi me emim mpɛn ebien: ɔagye me panyin; na, hwɛ, afei ɔagye me nhyira. Na obisaa dɛ, Ana enngyaa me nhyira biara? 37Na Isaak buae na ɔsee Esau dɛ. Hwɛ mayɛ no wo wura, na medze no nuanom nyinara mayɛ no nkowaa; na eburow nye nsa nna medze awowaw no: na ɔwo dze, ebɛnadze na menyɛ mma wo, me ba? 38 Na Esau bisaa n’egya dɛ, Aso nhyira kor pɛ na ewɔ, m’egya? Hyira mo so, mo so bi, ao m’egya. Na Esau maa ne ndze do na osui. 39 Na n’egya Isaak buae na ɔsee no dɛ,
Hwɛ, mbrɛ asaase a seradze nnyi no na ɔbɛyɛ wo tsenabea,
Na mbrɛ ɔsor ɔbɔsu yɛ hɔ na;
40 Na edze w’afona bɛtsena ase, na ebɔsom wo nua;
Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ egye woho a,
ɔno ibeyi no kɔndua wɔ wo kɔn ho.
41Na Esau taan Jakob wɔ nhyira a n’egya dze hyiraa no ntsi: na Esau see n’akoma mu dɛ, Nda a wɔdze bosu m’egya no abɛn; afei muruboku mo nua Jakob. 42Na ne ba panyin Esua ne nsɛm no wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Rebeka; na ɔsomae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ ne ba kuma Jakob, na ɔsee no dɛ, Hwɛ, wo nua Esau kyekye no werɛ wɔ wo ho dɛ oruboku wo. 43Dɛm ntsi afei, me ba, tsie me ndze; na soɛr, guan kɔ mo nua Laban nkyɛn wɔ Haran; 44na kɛtsena ne nkyɛn nda kakra, kɛpem dɛ wo nua n’ebufuw befi no mu; 45na no werɛ befir dza edze ayɛ no no; na mobɔsoma ma wɔaabɛfa wo wɔ hɔ aba: bɛyɛ dɛn ntsi na mobɔhwer hom beenu nyina da kor?
46Na Rebeka see Isaak dɛ, Mo nkwa afon me, osian Het mbabaa ntsi: sɛ Jakob war yer wɔ Het mbabaa mu, dɛ woyinom a, wɔ asaase yi do mbabaa yi mu a, nna membrɛe ngui bi? Nna metse ase reyɛ dɛn?

Title: GYENESIS 28
Content:
Jakob Kɔ Laban Nkyɛn
1Na Isaak frɛɛ Jakob, na ohyiraa no, na ɔhyɛɛ no, na ɔsee no dɛ, Mma nnwar yer wɔ Keenan mbabaa mu. 2Soɛr, kɔ Paddan-aram, wo na n’egya Betuel fie; na kɔwar yer wɔ wo na no nua Laban ne mbabaa no hɔn mu. 3Na Nyankopɔn Otumfo nhyira wo, na ɔmma wo, na dɔr, ama aayɛ aman asafo; 4 na ɔmfa Abraham nhyira mma ɔwo nye w’asefo a wɔka wo ho; ama eenya asaase a eyɛ do hɔho a Nyankopɔn dze maa Abraham yi. 5Na Isaak gyaa Jakob kwan: na ɔkɔr Sirianyi Betuel ne ba Laban a ɔyɛ Jakob nye Esau hɔn na Rebeka no nuabanyin no nkyɛn wɔ Paddan-aram. 6Afei Esau hun dɛ Isaak ehyira Jakob, na oegya no kwan dɛ ɔnkɔ Paddan-Aram nkɔwar yer wɔ hɔ; na orihyira no no ɔhyɛɛ no dɛ, Mma nnwar yer wɔ Keenan mbabaa hɔn mu; 7ma Jakob etsie n’egya nye ne na, na ɔkɔ Paddan-aram. 8Na Esau hun dɛ Keenan mbabaa no nnyɛ n’egya Isaak enyisɔ no; 9osii mu kɔr Ismael nkyɛn, na ɔkɔwaar Abraham ne ba Ismael ne babaa Mahalat a ɔyɛ Nebaiot n’akyerɛbaa, kaa no yernom no ho.
Jakob N’adaaso Wɔ Bɛtɛl
10Na Jakob fii Beer-seba, na osii mu kɔr Haran afamu. 11Na ɔsoɛɛ bea bi do, na ɔtsenaa hɔ anafua no nyinara, osiandɛ iwi akɔtɔ, na ɔfaa hɔ abo no kor na ɔdze ne tsir sunii, na ɔdaa hɔ. 12 Na ɔsoo daa, na hwɛ atwer si asaase do, na n’etsifi pem sor; Nyankopɔn n’abɔfoe ridzi do mfowsian. 13Na, hwɛ, EWURADZE gyina n’etsifi, na ɔsee dɛ, Emi nye EWURADZE, w’egya Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, na Isaak ne Nyankopɔn: asaase a eda do no, medze mebɛma ɔwo, nye w’asefo. 14 Na w’asefo bɛyɛ dɛ asaase do huntuma, na ebɛtserɛw akɔ anee, boka, nye kwaamu, nye pomu: na ɔwo nye w’asefo mu na wobehyira asaase do ebusua ebusua nyinara. 15Na, hwɛ, menye wo nam, na mobɔhwɛ wo do wɔ beebiara a ebɔkɔ, na medze wo maba asaase yi do bio; na minnkegya wo hɔ, ekodu dɛ mebɛma dza maka makyerɛ wo yi ayɛ hɔ. 16Na Jakob fii ne nda mu nyanee, na ɔsee dɛ, Ampaara, EWURADZE wɔ ha; naaso nna minnyim. 17Na n’akoma tui, na ɔsee dɛ, ha yi yɛ hu ampa ae! Ha nnyɛ beebiara dɛ Nyankopɔn ne fie a, na ha nye hɛben abotsen no. 18Na Jakob soɛɛr anapaatu, na ɔfaa ɔbo no a osunii no, na ɔdze yɛɛ idum sii hɔ, na ohuee ngo guu do. 19Na ɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin Bɛtɛl: na asɔpɔn no nkyɛ kurow no ne dzin dze Luz. 20Na Jakob bɔɔ anohoba see dɛ, Sɛ Nyankopɔn dzi m’ekyir, na ɔhwɛ mo do wɔ ɔkwan yi a murutu yi mu, na ɔma me edziban ma midzi, nye atar ma mehyɛ, 21ma meba m’egya fie bio wɔ asomdwee mu a, ɔno EWURADZE bɛyɛ me Nyankopɔn, 22na ɔbo yi a medze mayɛ idum esi hɔ yi, bɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne fi: na dza ebɛma me nyinara mebɛma wo mu ebupɛn du du.

Title: GYENESIS 29
Content:
Jakob Kodu Laban Fie
1Na Jakob sii no kwan do, na ɔbaa bokamba hɔn asaase do. 2Na ɔhwɛe no, nna ohun dɛ, bura bi wɔ haban no mu, na, hwɛ, nguankuw ebiasa gugu ho wɔ hɔ; osiandɛ bura no no mu nsu na wɔsaw ma nguankuw no ma wɔnom: na ɔbo a ɔda bura no n’ano no so. 3Na hɔ na nguankuw no nyinara wohyia: na sɛ wohyia a wopirew ɔbo no fi bura no n’ano, na wɔma nguan no nsu ma wɔnom, na wopirew ɔbo no hin bura no n’ano bio. 4Na Jakob bisaa hɔn dɛ, Mo nuanom, hom fi hen? Na wobuaa dɛ, Yefi Haran. 5Na obisaa hɔn dɛ, Ana hom nyim Nahor ne ba Laban a? Na wɔsee dɛ, Yenyim no, 6Na obisaa hɔn dɛ, No ho ye? Na wɔsee dɛ, No ho ye: na, hwɛ, ne babaa Rahel na ɔnye nguan reba yi. 7Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Hwɛ, adze nnyae nnsae, nkyii so aber a wɔka mbowa nnyae nndurii: hom mma nguan no nsu ma wɔnnom, na hom nkɔ nkɛma hɔn edziban. 8Na wɔsee dɛ, Yennkotum, gyedɛ wɔaboaboa nguankuw no nyinara ano, na woepirew ɔbo efi bura no n’ano; ansaana yɛama nguan no nsu ma wɔaanom. 9Na Jakob nye hɔn da ho rekasa no, nna Rahel nye n’egya no nguan no bae: nna ɔno na ɔhwɛ hɔn. 10Na ɔbaa dɛ, aber a Jakob hun ne na no nua Laban ne babaa Rahel, na ne na no nua Laban no nguan no, ɔtwee pinii, na okepireew ɔbo no fii bura no n’ano, na ɔmaa ne na no nua Laban no nguan no nsu ma wɔnomee. 11Na Jakob feew Rahel n’ano, na ɔmaa ne ndze do, na osui. 12Na Jakob kaa kyerɛɛ Rahel dɛ, n’egya n’awɔfase nye no, na ɔyɛ Rebeka ne ba: na Rahel tuu enguan na ɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ n’egya. 13Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Laban tsee n’akyerɛbaa ne ba Jakob ne nka no, otutuu enguan kehyiaa no kwan, na ɔyɛɛ no etuu, na ɔfeew n’ano, na ɔdze no baa ne fie. Na ɔbɔɔ n’amandzɛɛ yi nyinara kyerɛɛ Laban. 14Na Laban see dɛ, Ampaara, eyɛ me biew nye mo honam. Na ɔtsenaa ne nkyɛn bosoom.
Jakob Som Laban Dze War Leah na Rahel
15Na Laban see Jakob dɛ, Ana osiandɛ mo nua nye wo ntsi, ebɔsom me kwa? Ka kyerɛ me, ebɛnadze na ɔnyɛ w’akatua? 16Na Laban wɔ mbabaa beenu: panyin dze no ne dzin dze Leah, na ekumaba no ne dzin dze Rahel. 17Na Leah n’enyiwa yɛ meamea; na Rahel dze no ho yɛ fɛw na n’enyim wɔ nyam. 18Na Jakob dɔɔ Rahel; na ɔsee dɛ, Wo ba kuma Rahel ntsi mobɔsom wo mfe esuon. 19Na Laban see dɛ, Oye dɛ medze no mebɛma wo sen dɛ medze no mebɛma ɔbarimba bi: enye me ntsena. 20Na Rahel ntsi Jakob soom mfe esuon; na ɔdɔ a ɔdɔ no ntsi, ɔyɛɛ n’enyi do dɛ nda kumaabi. 21Na Jakob see Laban dɛ, Fa me yer ma me, na me nda aso, ma monkɔ ne nkyɛn. 22Na Laban hyiahyiaa ekuromfo nyinara, na ɔtoo pon. 23Na ɔbaa dɛ anafua no ɔfaa ne babaa Leah, na ɔdze no brɛɛ no; na ɔnye no dae 24Na Laban dze n’abaawa Zilpa maa ne babaa Leah abaawa. 25Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no, nna Jakob nkɔhwɛ a saana Leah a: na obisaa Laban dɛ, Ebɛnadze na ayɛ me yi? Nnyɛ Rahel ntsi na mosoom wo bi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi mbɔ na adaadaa me yi? 26Na Laban see dɛ, Hɛn ha wɔnnyɛ no dɛm; wɔmmfa ekumaba no mma awar ana wɔdze abakan no ama. 27Ma oyi ne dapɛn nso, na yɛdze ɔno so bɛma wo wɔ ɔsom a ebɔsom me mfe esuon fofor bio ntsi. 28Na Jakob yɛɛ dɛm, na ɔmaa ne dapɛn kor soe: na ɔdze ne babaa Rahel so maa no awar. 29Na Laban dze n’abaawa Bilha maa ne babaa Rahel dɛ abaawa. 30Na Jakob kɔr Rahel so nkyɛn nye no dae, na ɔdɔɔ Rahel seen Leah, na ɔsoom Laban mfe esuon fofor bio.
Jakob Ne Mba
31Na EWURADZE hun dɛ wɔtan Leah no, obuee n’awoo kwan: na Rahel dze nna ɔbɔnyin a. 32Na Leah nyinsenii, na ɔwoo babanyin, na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Reuben a asekyerɛ nye; Monhwɛ ɔbabanyin: na ɔsee dɛ, EWURADZE ahwɛ m’amandzehu; na afei dze mo kun bɔdɔ me. 33Na onyinseen bio, na ɔwoo babanyin; na ɔsee dɛ, Osiandɛ EWURADZE atse dɛ wɔtan me ntsi, na ɔdze ɔba yi so ama me: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Simeon a asekyerɛ nye; Otsie. 34Na onyinseen bio, na ɔwoo babanyin; na ɔsee dɛ, Afei na mo kun nye me bɛka, osiandɛ mawo mbabanyin baasa ama no: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Levi asekyerɛ nye; Ahofam. 35Na onyinseen bio, na ɔwoo babanyin: na ɔsee dɛ, Afei mibeyi EWURADZE ayɛw: dɛm ntsi ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Juda; a asekyerɛ nye; Ayɛyi na ogyaa awoo.

Title: GYENESIS 30
Content:
1Na Rahel hun dɛ ɔnnwo ba mma Jakob no, Rahel n’enyi beer no nua no; na ɔsee Jakob dɛ, Ma me mba, ɔno mubowu. 2Na Jakob no bo fuuw Rahel: na ɔsee dɛ, Ana midzi Nyankopɔn a ɔakam wo yamu mba no ananmu? 3Rahel see dɛ, Hwɛ, m’abaawa Bilha nye yi, nye no nda; ama ɔaawo egu me serɛ do, na mo so menam no do meenya mba. 4Na ɔdze n’abaawa Bilha maa no awar: na Jakob kɔr ne nkyɛn. 5Na Bilha nyinsenii, na ɔwoo babanyin maa Jakob. 6Na Rahel see dɛ, Nyankopɔn edzi m’asɛm ama me, na eso oetsie me ndze, na ɔama me babanyin: dɛm ntsi ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Dan a asekyerɛ nye: ɔsɛndzifo. 7Na Rahel n’abaawa Bilha nyinseen bio, na ɔwoo babanyin a otsia ebien maa Jakob. 8Na Rahel see dɛ, Menye m’akyerɛbaa edzi aper a no mu yɛ dzen, na medzi nyim: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Naftali a asekyerɛ nye, M’akodzi. 9Na aber a Leah hun dɛ n’awoo mu atwe oegyaa awoo no, ɔfaa n’abaawa Zilpa, na ɔdze no maa Jakob awar. 10Na Leah n’abaawa Zilpa woo babanyin maa Jakob. 11Na Leah see dɛ, Siar aba, na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Gad a asekyerɛ nye, Yiedzi. 12Na Leah n’abaawa Zilpa woo babanyin a otsia ebien maa Jakob. 13Na Leah see dɛ, Ahomkanyi nye me, na mbabaa bɛfrɛ me ɔhomkanyi: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Aser a asekyerɛ nye Nhyira. 14Na ewifua twaber mu no, Reuben kɔr hamu kohun mandreke, na ɔdze brɛɛ ne na Leah. Nna Rahel see Leah dɛ, Meserɛ wo, ma me wo ba ne mandreke yi bi. 15Na ɔsee no dɛ, Ana ɔyɛ asɛm ba dɛ egye mo kun, na me ba ne mandreke yi so erebɛgye? Na Rahel see dɛ, Nna ma ɔnye wo nda anafua yi osian wo ba ne mandreke no ntsi. 16Na Jakob fi hamu ewimbir reba no, Leah puei kehyiaa no kwan, na ɔsee dɛ, Bra me nkyɛn, na ampaara medze me ba ne mandreke abɔ wo paa. Na ɔnye no daa anafua no. 17Na Nyankopɔn tsiee Leah, na onyinsenii, na ɔwoo babanyin a otsia enum maa Jakob. 18Na Leah see dɛ, Nyankopɔn dze m’apaabɔdze ama me, osiandɛ medze m’abaawa memaa mo kun awar: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Isakar; ase nye, Akatua nye yi. 19Na Leah nyinseen bio, na ɔwoo babanyin a otsia esia maa Jakob. 20Na Leah see dɛ, Nyankopɔn ama me akyɛdze a oye; afei na mo kun nye me bɛtsena, osiandɛ mawo mbabanyin beesia ama no; na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Zebulun; ase nye, Atseyie. 21Na n’ekyir no ɔwoo babaa, na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Dina. 22Na Nyankopɔn kaa Rahel, na otsiee no, na obuee n’awoo kwan. 23Na onyinsenii, na ɔwoo babanyin: na ɔsee dɛ, Nyankopɔn eyi m’ahorohoraa: 24na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Josef, see dɛ, EWURADZE mma me ɔba kor so nka ho.
Jakob N’ahonya
25Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Rahel woo Josef no, nna Jakob see Laban dɛ, Gya me kwan ma monkɔ mbrɛ mifi na me man mu. 26Fa me yernom nye me mba a hɔn ntsi masom wo no ma me, na ma monkɔ: na ɔwoara nyim mo som a medze masom wo. 27Na Laban see no dɛ, Sɛ afei menya w’enyim enyimnyam a, tsintsim: na mehu dɛ ɔwo ntsi na EWURADZE ehyira me. 28Na ɔsee dɛ, Kyerɛ me w’akatua, na medze bɛma. 29Na ɔsee no dɛ, ɔwoara nyim beebi mbrɛ mesi na masom wo, na mbrɛ wo mbowakuw esi na wɔayɛ wɔ me nsamu. 30Na mebae no, nna kumaabi na ewɔ, nna ɔadɔr ɔayɛ pii yi; na EWURADZE ehyira wo wɔ beebiara a mefae: na afei aber bɛn na mobɔhwɛ mara me fie so? 31Na ɔsee dɛ, Ebɛnadze na memfa memma wo? Na Jakob see dɛ, Mma mma me hwee: sɛ ebɛyɛ iyi ama me a, ɔno mebɛnyɛn wo nguan bio, na mahwɛ hɔn. 32Ndɛ mebɛfa wo nguan nyinara mu, na meyiyi nguan a hɔn ho yɛ woranworan nye ntokowa ntokowa nyinara, na nguan etuntum a wɔwɔ nguantsen no mu nyinara, nye mpɔnkye no dza hɔn ho yɛ ntokowa ntokowa nye woranworan no efi mu: na hɔn a wɔtse dɛm no na ɔnyɛ m’apaabɔdze. 33Ama daakye eba m’apaabɔdze a ɔda w’enyim yi do a, me ndzeyɛtsenenee eebua ama me; mpɔnkye no mu dza hɔn ho nnyɛ woranworan nye ntokowa ntokowa no, na nguantsen no hɔn mu dza wɔnnyɛ etuntum no nyinara, ɔno na sɛ wohu wɔ mo hɔ a, wombu no adzewiadze. 34Na Laban see dɛ, Hwɛ, ka mo nko a nkyɛ dza aka no ara ɔbɛyɛ dɛmara. 35Na da no ara Jakob yiyii mpɔnkyenyin a hɔn ho yɛ nsensanee nsensanee nye ntokowa ntokowa no; nye mpɔnkyeber a hɔn ho yɛ woranworan nye ntokowa ntokowa no nyinara, dza fufuw wɔ hɔn ho no nyinara, nye nguantsen no hɔn mu etuntum no nyinara, na ɔdze hɔn hyɛɛ ne mbabanyin nsa; 36na ɔmaa ndaansa kwan daa ɔnoara nye Jakob ntamu: na Jakob nyɛɛn Laban no nguan nkaa no. 37Na Jakob faa sɛsɛ dua nye almɔnd dua nye odwon dua mbaa momon; na oyiyii ho nsema efufuw, na ɔmaa mbaa no ho efufuw no puepuei. 38Na ɔdze mbaa no a oyiyii ho no guu nguan no hɔn tsentsen do wɔ nsuka a ɔwɔ mu mbrɛ nguan no ba hɔ bɔnom nsu no mu; na wɔba bɔnom nsu a nna wɔfow hɔnho. 39Na nguan no nyinsenyinsenii wɔ mbaa no enyim, na nguan no wowoo nsensanee nsensanee, woranworan, nye ntokowa ntokowa. 40Na Jakob paa nguambaa no na ɔmaa nguan no hɔn enyim kɔr Laban nguan no mu nsensanee nsensanee nye etuntum no nyinara hɔn do; na ɔyɛɛ narankasa no nguankuw wɔ nkyɛn, na ɔammfa ammfora Laban no nguan no mu. 41Na ɔbaa dɛ, aber biara sɛ nguan a hɔn ho yɛ dzen no wonyinsenyinsen a, nna Jakob dze mbaa no ekogu nguan no hɔn enyim wɔ nsuka no mu, ama woeenyinsenyinsen mbaa no do; 42na sɛ nguan no yɛ mberɛw dze a, ɔno ɔmmfa nngu mu: dɛm ntsi hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw no nye Laban dze, na hɔn a hɔn ho yɛ dzen no nye Jakob dze. 43Na Jakob yɛɛ kɛsenara, na onyaa nguan pii, nye mfonabaa nye nkowaa, nye efumpɔnkɔ nye nsoasopɔnkɔ.

Title: GYENESIS 31
Content:
Jakob Guan Fi Laban Fie
1Na ɔtsee Laban ne mbabanyin nsɛm a wɔkae, dɛ, Jakob afa dza ɔyɛ hɛn egya dze nyinara; na dza ɔyɛ hɛn egya dze na ɔdze enya egyapadze yi nyinara. 2Na Jakob hwɛɛ Laban no ntɔn mu, na hwɛ, ɔnntse dɛ mbrɛ nkyɛ nkan no ɔtse wɔ no do no. 3Na EWURADZE see Jakob dɛ, San kɔ w’egyanom asaase do, na w’ebusua mu; na mibedzi w’ekyir. 4Na Jakob somae na wɔkɛfrɛɛ Rahel nye Leah ma wɔbaa hamu wɔ no nguan no nkyɛn, 5na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Muhu hom egya no ntɔn dɛ ɔnntse me dɛ nkan no; na m’egya ne Nyankopɔn na oedzi m’ekyir. 6Na homara nyim dɛ m’ahoɔdzen nyinara na medze asom hom egya. 7Na hom egya adaadaa me, na ɔasakyer m’akatua mpɛn du; na Nyankopɔn na ɔamma no kwan ma ɔannyɛ me bɔn. 8Sɛ ɔse dɛ, Hɔn a hɔn ho yɛ woranworan no na ɔnyɛ w’akatua a, ɔno nguan no nyinara wowo woranworan: na sɛ ɔse dɛ, Hɔn a hɔn ho yɛ nsensanee nsensanee na ɔnyɛ w’akatua a, ɔno nguan no nyinara wowo nsensanee nsensanee. 9Dɛm na Nyankopɔn agye hom egya no mbowa, na ɔdze hɔn ama me. 10Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a nguan no nyinsenyinsenii no, nna memaa m’enyiwa do, na muhun no wɔ adaaso mu, na, hwɛ, mpɔnkyenyin a wɔfow nguan no nyinara hɔn ho yɛ nsensanee nsensanee, woranworan, nye ntokowa ntokowa. 11Na Nyankopɔn no bɔfoe see me wɔ adaaso mu dɛ, Jakob: na mesee dɛ, Emi nye yi. 12Na ɔsee dɛ, Afei ma w’enyiwa do, na hwɛ, mpɔnkyenyin a wɔfow mpɔnkyeber no nyinara hɔn ho yɛ nsensanee nsensanee, woranworan, nye ntokowa ntokowa: na mehu dza Laban reyɛ wo nyinara. 13 Emi nye Bɛtɛl Nyankopɔn, beebi mbrɛ eseraa idum ho no a, beebi mbrɛ ebɔɔ me anohoba no a; afei soɛr, fi asaase yi do, na san kɔ w’awobea asaase do. 14Na Rahel nye Leah buae na wɔsee no dɛ, Ana kyɛpɛn anaa egyapadze biara da ho wɔ hɔ ma hɛn wɔ hɛn egya fie a? 15Ana ommbuu hɛn ahɔho bi a? Osiandɛ ɔatɔn hɛn, na eso oedzi hɛn tsisika ewie. 16Osiandɛ ahonyadze a Nyankopɔn agye no hɛn egya hɔ nyinara hɛn nye hɛn mba dze a: na afei, dza Nyankopɔn aka akyerɛ wo no nyinara, yɛ. 17Nna Jakob soɛree, na ɔfaa ne mba nye ne yernom tsenatsenaa efumpɔnkɔ do; 18na ɔfaa no mbowa nyinara, nye n’ahodze a onyae wɔ Paddan-aram no nyinara na, osii mu dɛ ɔrokɔ n’egya Isaak nkyɛn wɔ Keenan asaase do. 19Nna Laban kɔ rukotwitwa no nguan ho nhwi: na Rahel wiaa n’egya no suman. 20Na Jakob wiaa noho guanee; osiandɛ ɔannka annkyerɛ Laban, Sirianyi no. 21Na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara guanee; na ɔsoɛree, na otwaa Esutsen no, na ɔmaa n’enyi kɔr Gilead bepɔw do.
Laban Tsie Jakob
22Na ne ndaansa no wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Laban dɛ Jakob eguan. 23Na ɔfaa no nkorɔfo kaa noho, na otsiiw no nda esuon kwan; na ɔbɔtoo no Gilead bepɔw do. 24Na Nyankopɔn baa Laban, Sirianyi no hɔ wɔ anafua adaaso mu, na ɔsee no dɛ, Hwɛ woho yie amma aannkasa papa anaa bɔn annkyerɛ Jakob. 25Na Laban too Jakob. Nna Jakob abɔ n’asesee wɔ bepɔw no do: na Laban ɔnye no nkorɔfo so bobɔɔ hɔndze wɔ Gilead bepɔw do. 26Na Laban bisaa Jakob dɛ, Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi, na ewia woho eguan me, na asoa me mbabaa dze hɔn rokɔ dɛ hɔn a wɔdze mfowa afa hɔn ndɔmmum yi? 27Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na isumae guanee, na iwiaa woho fii me nkyɛn; na annka annkyerɛ me, ma maammfa enyigye na ndwom, mpintsin na ɔnye nsanku menngya wo kwan; 28na amma maammfew me mbabanyin nye me mbabaa hɔn ano? Afei dze ayɛ nkwaseadze. 29Mowɔ tum dɛ nkyɛ menye wo dzi no bɔn: na ndeda anafua w’egya ne Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ, Hwɛ woho yie, mma aannkasa papa anaa bɔn annkyerɛ Jakob. 30Na afei kaansa afe w’egya fie dodoodow ma ehia dɛ ekɔ mpo a, ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ewia mo suman yi? 31Na Jakob buae na ɔsee Laban dɛ, Osiandɛ musuroi: na mesee dɛ, ɔbɛyɛ na eregye wo mbabaa wɔ me nsamu enyimpi do. 32Nyimpa biara a ibohu wo suman wɔ no hɔ no, onyii no ɔnnkɛtsena ase: hɛn nuanom hɔn enyim ha yi ara hwehwɛ dza ɔyɛ wodze wɔ me nkyɛn, na fa w’adze. Nna Jakob nnyim dɛ Rahel na oewia. 33Na Laban kɔr Jakob n’asesee mu, nye Leah n’asesee mu, nye mbaawa beenu no hɔn asesee mu; na oennhu. Na ofii Leah n’asesee mu, na ɔkɛhɛɛn Rahel n’asesee mu. 34Afei Rahel afa suman no, na ɔdze ahyehyɛ efupɔnkɔ n’adze a wɔdze hyehyɛ no mu, na ɔatsena do. Na Laban kekaa asese no no ho nyinara, na oennhu. 35Na ɔsee n’egya dɛ, Mma mma ɔnnyɛ mo wura ebufuw dɛ munntum monnsoɛr wɔ w’enyim; na mayɛ mbaadze. Na ɔhwehwɛe, na oennhu suman no. 36Na Jakob no bo fuwii, na ɔnye Laban hamee: na Jakob buae see Laban dɛ, Mo mfom nye mmuana? Mo bɔn nye mmuana, ma etsiw me ɔhyew do dɛm yi? 37Ehwehwɛɛ me ndzɛmba nyinara yi, wo fie ndzɛmba nyinara mu ebɛnadze na ehu no wɔ mu? Fa si mo nuanom nye wo nuanom hɔn enyim ha, ma wombu hɛn beenu ntamu atsɛn. 38Matsena wo nkyɛn mfe eduonu nye yi; wo nguamber nye wo mpɔnkyeber ammpon mba da, na wo nguan mu nguannyin so, menndzi bi. 39Hɔn a mbowa kum hɔn no, mammfa ammbrɛ wo; ɔyɛɛ mara me kaw. Dza wowiaa no ewia o, dza wowiaa no anafua o, egyee no mo hɔ. 40Mbrɛ meyɛe nye yi; adzekyee a nna ewia rehyew me, adzesaa a nna awɔw resar me; na m’enyi so kokwae. 41Mfe eduonu nye yi na matsena wo fie; wo mbabaa beenu ntsi mosoom wo mfe duanan, na wo mbowakuw so ntsi mfe esia: na asakyer m’akatua mpɛn du. 42Sɛ m’egya ne Nyankopɔn, Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, nye Isaak no Suro, enndzi m’ekyir a, nkyɛ ndɛ egya me kwan nsapan. Nyankopɔn ehu m’amandzehu nye me nsaano edwumayɛ, na anadwe yi ɔaka w’enyim.
Jakob Na Laban Dzi Ahyɛmu
43Na Laban buae na ɔsee Jakob dɛ, Mbabaa yi me mbabaa a, na mba yi me mba a, na nguan yi mo nguan a, na dza ihu yi nyinara medze a: na ebɛnadze na mubotum mayɛ me mbabaa yi, anaa hɔn mba a wɔawo hɔn yi ndɛ? 44Na afei bra, ma yendzi ahyɛmu, emi nye ɔwo; na ma ɔnyɛ dase wɔ emi nye ɔwo ntamu. 45Na Jakob faa ɔbo, na ɔdze yɛɛ idum sii hɔ. 46Na Jakob see no nkorɔfo dɛ, Hom mboaboa abo ano; na wɔtasee abo, na wɔhɔɔr no isiw: na wodzidzii siw no ho hɔ. 47Na Laban frɛɛ no Jegar-sahaduta: na Jakob dze ɔfrɛɛ no Galeed. 48Na Laban see dɛ, Isiw yi nyɛ emi nye ɔwo ntamu dase ndɛ. Dɛm ntsi ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Galeed: 49na Mizpa osiandɛ ɔsee dɛ, sɛ Yɛpaapaa mu a, EWURADZE nhwɛ emi nye ɔwo ntamu. 50Sɛ ebɛtseetsee me mbabaa, na sɛ ebɔwar yernom aka me mbabaa ho a, obi nnka hɛn ho; hwɛ, Nyankopɔn nye emi nye ɔwo ntamu dasefo. 51Na Laban see Jakob dɛ, Hwɛ abo siw yi, na hwɛ idum a mama do mesi emi nye ɔwo ntamu yi. 52Isiw yi yɛ dase, na idum yi yɛ dase, dɛ mennkɛtra siw yi maba wo nkyɛn, na wo so ennkɛtra siw yi nye idum yi aba me nkyɛn, abɛyɛ bɔn. 53Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, nye Nahor Nyankopɔn, hɔn egya ne Nyankopɔn, ombu hɛn ntamu atsɛn. Na Jakob dze n’egya Isaak no Suro no dzii nsew. 54Na Jakob bɔɔ afɔr wɔ bepɔw no do, na ɔfrɛɛ no nuanom dɛ wombedzidzi: na wodzidzii, na wotsintsimii wɔ bepɔw no do anafua no nyinara. 55Na Laban soɛɛr anapaatu, na ɔfeew ne mbabanyin nye ne mbabaa no hɔn ano, na ohyiraa hɔn: na Laban sanee kɔr no kurow mu.

Title: GYENESIS 32
Content:
Jakob Siesie Noho Hyia Esau
1Na Jakob sii no kwan do, na Nyankopɔn n’abɔfoe behyiaa no. 2Na Jakob hun hɔn no ɔsee dɛ, Nyankopɔn no dɔm nye yi: na ɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin Mahanaim.
3Na Jakob tuu abɔfo ma wodzii n’enyim kan kɔr no nua Esau hɔ wɔ Seir asaase do, Edom haban mu. 4Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ, Hom nkɛse mo wura Esau dɛm; dɛ, Mbrɛ w’akowaa Jakob se nye yi, Menye Laban akɛtsena, na makyɛr hɔ ara ma ebodu ndɛ. 5Menya anantwi, nsoasopɔnkɔ, nguan, mpɔnkye na nkowaa nye mfonabaa: na masoma dɛ wɔmbɛka nkyerɛ mo wura, ama meenya w’enyim adom. 6Na abɔfo no sanee baa Jakob hɔ, dɛ, Yɛkɔr wo nua Esau hɔ na mbom ɔnoara so reba ebehyia wo kwan, na mbarimba ahaanan ka no ho. 7Nna Jakob n’akoma tuu kɛsenara, na no ho hiahiaa no. Na obuee nkorɔfo a wɔnye no nam no, nye mpɔnkye, nguan, anantwi nye efumpɔnkɔ no hɔn mu ekuw ebien; 8na ɔsee dɛ, Sɛ Esau ba kuw kor do, na oboku hɔn a, ɔno ikuw a ɔaka no eefi nsa. 9Na Jakob see dɛ, Ao, m’egya Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, na m’egya Isaak ne Nyankopɔn, ao, EWURADZE a esee me dɛ, San kɔ wo man mu, nye w’ebusua mu, na mebɛyɛ wo yie: 10ehumbɔbɔr nye nokwar a eyi akyerɛ w’akowaa no mennsɛ no mu biara; osiandɛ mo poma ara na medze twaa Jordan yi; na afei mayɛ ekuw ebien. 11Meserɛ wo, gye me fi mo nua Esau nsamu: na musuro no, bɛyɛ na ɔaba eboku emi, nye enanom nye hɔn mba yi. 12 Na esee me dɛ, Ampaara mebɛyɛ wo yie, na mama w’asefo ayɛ dɛ mpoano anhwea a no dodow ntsi wɔkan a ɔnnyɛ. 13Na ɔsoɛɛ hɔ anafua no; na oyii dza ɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no mu bi dɛ ɔdze rekɛkyɛ no nua Esau; 14mpɔnkyeber ahaenu nye mpɔnkyenyin eduonu, nguamber ahaenu nye nguannyin eduonu, 15efumpɔnkɔ a wɔma enumfo eduasa nye hɔn mba, anantwiber eduanan nye anantwinyin du, nsoasopɔnkɔber eduonu nye nsoasopɔnkɔmba du. 16Na ɔdze no ekuwekuw hyɛɛ no nkowaa no nsa; na ɔsee no nkowaa no dɛ, Hom ntwa mu ndzi m’enyim, na hom mma ikuw nye ikuw ntamu mbra kwan. 17Na ɔhyɛɛ dza odzi kan no dɛ, Sɛ mo nua Esau nye wo hyia, na obisa wo dɛ, Woana n’abofra nye wo, erokɔ henfa, na dza wodzi w’enyim yi woana dze a? 18Ɔno se dɛ, W’akowaa Jakob dze a; ɔyɛ akyɛdze a wɔdze rekɛma mo wura Esau: na, hwɛ, ɔnoara so dzi hɛn ekyir. 19Na ɔhyɛɛ dza otsia ebien no so, nye dza otsia ebiasa no, nye hɔn a wɔka mbowakuw no do no nyinara dɛ, Sɛ hom hu Esau a, wɔnka dɛm asɛm yi ara nkyerɛ no. 20Na hom nse dɛ, Nkyii so, hwɛ w’akowaa Jakob so dzi hɛn ekyir. Afei ɔkaa ɔsee dɛ, Medze akyɛdze a odzi m’enyim yi bɔkɔ akɔdwedwe no, na n’ekyir no meehu n’enyim; bi a no bo bɔdwe. 21Nna akyɛdze no twaa mu dzii n’enyim: na ɔnoara dze, ɔtsenaa dɔm no mu anafua no.
Jakob N’aperdzi Wɔ Peniel
22Na ɔsoɛɛr anafua no, na ɔfaa ne yernom beenu no, nye ne mbaawa beenu no, nye ne mba dubiako no, na okotwaa Jabbok esutwaree. 23Na ɔmaa wotwaa esutsen no, na ɔmaa dza ɔwɔ nyinara twae. 24 Na ɔkaa Jakob no nko; na banyin bi nye no dzii aper wɔ hɔ ara ma okodur adzekyee. 25Na nyimpa no hun dɛ onndzi Jakob do konyim no, nna ɔkaa n’aserɛ tokur mu; na Jakob no ndwonku huanee wɔ aperper a ɔnye no dzii no mu. 26Na banyin no see dɛ, Ma monkɔ, na adze rekye. Na ɔsee dɛ, Mennkɛma akɔ, gyedɛ ehyira me ana. 27Na banyin no bisaa no dɛ, Wo dzin dze dɛn? Na obuaa dɛ, Jakob. 28 Na ɔsee dɛ, Wɔnnkɛfrɛ wo dzin Jakob bio, na mbom, Israel: osiandɛ ɔwo enye Nyankopɔn na ɔnye nyimpa ako, na edzi konyim. 29 Na Jakob bisaa no dɛ, Meserɛ wo, bɔ wo dzin kyerɛ me. Na ɔsee dɛ, Na iribisa me dzin ayɛ dɛn? Na banyin no hyiraa no wɔ hɔ. 30Na Jakob frɛɛ bea no ne dzin Peniel; osiandɛ, ɔsee dɛ, Mehu Nyankopɔn mpu na mpu, naaso me kra enya nkwa. 31Na orutwa mu wɔ Peniel no nna ewia epue, na no ndwonku a ehuan no ntsi nna ohuan n’aserɛ mu. 32Dɛm ntsi ɔdze bodu ndɛ da yi ara Israelmba nndzi ntsin a ɔwɔ ndwonku mu no: osiandɛ ɔkaa Jakob no ndwonku wɔ mbrɛ ntsin no wɔ no.

Title: GYENESIS 33
Content:
Jakob Nye Esau Hyia
1Na Jakob maa n’enyiwa do, na ɔhwɛe, na, hwɛ, nna Esau reba, na mbarimba ahaanan ka no ho. Na ɔkyɛɛ mbofra no mu maa Leah, nye Rahel, nye mbaawa beenu no. 2Na ɔdze mbaawa no nye hɔn mba no dzii kan, na ɔdze Leah nye ne mba no dzii hɔ, na ɔdze Rahel nye Josef dzii ekyir. 3Na ɔnoara paa ho kedzii hɔn enyim, na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze mpɛn esuon, dze kodur dɛ ɔbɛɛn no nua no. 4Na Esau tutuu enguan hyiaa no kwan, na ɔyɛɛ no etuu; na ɔdze ne nsa too no kɔn mu, na ɔfeew n’ano: na wosui. 5Na Esau maa n’enyiwa do, na ohun mbaa no nye mbofra no; na obisaa dɛ, Woananom na wɔka wo ho yi? Na Jakob buaa dɛ, Mbofra a Nyankopɔn dze adom w’akowaa a. 6Nna mbaawa no nye hɔn mba twee pinii, na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze. 7Na Leah nye ne mba so twee pinii, na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze: na n’ekyir no nna Josef nye Rahel twee pinii, na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze. 8Na Esau bisaa dɛ, Na ekuw a menye hɔn hyiae yi nyinara n’ase nye dɛn? Na ɔsee dɛ, Medze robɔhwehwɛ mo wura n’enyim enyimnyam. 9Na Esau see dɛ, Dza mowɔ no ara dɔɔ so; mo nua, ma w’adze nko hɔ mma wo. 10Na Jakob see dɛ, Dabida, meserɛ wo, sɛ afei menya w’enyim enyimnyam a, nna gye me nsamu akyɛdze: susuampa dɛ mehu w’enyim ara dɛ mbrɛ obiara bohu Nyankopɔn enyim, na masɔ w’enyi yi. 11Meserɛ wo, gye m’akyɛdze a wɔdze abrɛ wo yi; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn adom me, na eso dza mowɔ no dɔɔ so. Na ɔhyɛɛ no ma ɔgyee. 12Na Esau see dɛ, Ma yensi mu, na yɛnkɔ, na mibedzi w’enyim. 13Na ɔsee no dɛ, Mo wura nyim dɛ mbofra yi yɛ mberɛw, na eso nguan nye anantwi a wɔnye me nam yi wɔma enumfo: na sɛ wɔka hɔn dodow da kor a, nguan no nyinara bowuwu. 14Meserɛ wo, wɔmma mo wura mpa ho nkedzi n’akowaa enyim: na emi mobɔdwe m’enyi ara manantsew dɛ mbrɛ mbowa a wodzi m’enyim yi botum, na dɛ mbrɛ mbofra no botum, ekodu dɛ mubodu mo wura nkyɛn wɔ Seir. 15Na Esau see dɛ, Nna ma memfa nyimpa a wɔka mo ho yi bi mingya wo. Na ɔsee dɛ, Ma ɔnyɛ dɛn? Wɔmma minnya mo wura n’enyim enyimnyam. 16Nna Esau saan da no ara faa no kwan do kɔr Seir. 17Na Jakob sii mu kɔr Sukɔt, na okesii dan maa noho, na osisii mpata maa no mbowa: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin Sukɔt.
18Na Jakob baa Sekem kurow a ɔwɔ Keenan asaase do no mu asomdwee mu, wɔ ber a ofii Paddan-aram bae no; na ɔbɔbɔɔ asese wɔ kurow no n’enyim. 19 Na ɔtɔɔ asaase kakraba a ɔbɔɔ n’asesee wɔ do no, wɔ Sekem n’egya Hamor ne mba no hɔ, maa dwetɛ ɔha. 20Na osii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ, na ɔfrɛɛ no El-elohe-Israel a asekyerɛ nye Israel Nyankopɔn.

Title: GYENESIS 34
Content:
Sekem to Dina Mbɔndar
1Na Dina, Leah na Jakob hɔn babaa no, puei dɛ ɔrokɔhwɛ asaase no do mbabaa. 2Na Hamor, Hivinyi no, asaase no do hen no ne ba Sekem hun no; na ɔkyeer no nye no dae, na ɔbrɛɛ no adze. 3Na no werɛ kitsaa Dina Jakob ne babaa no, na ɔdɔɔ akataasia no na ɔkasaa ayamuyie mu kyerɛɛ no. 4Na Sekem kaa kyerɛɛ n’egya Hamor dɛ, Kɛgye akataasia yi yer ma me. 5Afei Jakob tsee dɛ oegu ne babaa Dina ho fi. Nna ne mbabanyin no wɔ no mbowa nkyɛn wɔ hamu ntsi ɔyɛɛ komm ma wɔbae ana. 6Na Sekem n’egya puei kɔr Jakob nkyɛn dɛ ɔrekɛnye no atwetwe nkɔmbɔ. 7Na Jakob ne mbabanyin no tsee no, wofii hamu baa fie: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn no yaw, na hɔn bo fuuw kɛsenara, osiandɛ Sekem ayɛ nkwaseadze wɔ Israel dɛ ɔnye Jakob ne babaa ada; adze a wɔnnyɛ. 8Na Hamor nye hɔn twetwee nkɔmbɔ see dɛ, Me ba Sekem no werɛ ekitsa hom babaa: meserɛ hom, wɔmfa no mma no awar. 9Na hom nye hɛn ndzi awarwar; hom mfa hom mbabaa mma hɛn, na hom so mfa hɛn mbabaa. 10Na hom nye hɛn ntsena: na asaase a ɔda hom enyim yi hom ntsena do, na hom ndzi gua wɔ do, na hom nnya adze wɔ do. 11Na Sekem see n’egya nye no nuanom no dɛ, Wɔmma minnya hom enyim enyimnyam, na dza hom bɛse me no mebɛma. 12Hom mbisa me tsiadze nye akyɛdze kɛse biara, na dza hom bɛse me no ara mebɛma: na hom mfa akataasia no mma me awar. 13Na Jakob ne mbabanyin no buaa Sekem nye n’egya Hamor ndaadaa mu, na ɔnam dɛ oegu hɔn akyerɛbaa Dina ho fi ntsi. 14Na wɔsee hɔn dɛ, Yɛyɛ dɛm adze yi a ɔnnkɛyɛ, dɛ yɛdze hɛn akyerɛbaa bɛma obi a wonntwaa no twatsia; na dɛm no yɛ enyimguase ma hɛn. 15Dza ogyina do a yɛbɛgye hom pen ara nye yi: dɛ sɛ hom bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ yɛtse, na woetwa hom mu mbanyin nyinara twatsia a; 16yɛdze hɛn mbabaa bɛma hom, na hɛn so yɛafa hom mbabaa, na yɛnye hom atsena, na yɛayɛ ɔman kor. 17Na sɛ hom nnketsie hɛn, na hom etwitwa twatsia a; ɔno yɛbɛfa hɛn babaa, na yɛakɔ. 18Na hɔn nsɛm no yɛɛ Hamor nye Hamor ne ba Sekem hɔn pɛ. 19Na aberantsɛ no ennkyinkyim dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛm adze no, osiandɛ ɔpɛ Jakob ne babaa no. Nna wodzi Sekem nyi sen n’egya ne fifo nyinara. 20Na Hamor nye ne ba Sekem baa hɔn kurow n’abotsenano, na wɔnye hɔn kurow mu mbanyin no twetwee nkɔmbɔ, dɛ, 21Mbarimba yi wɔnye hɛn tse no asomdwee mu; dɛm ntsi hom mma wɔntsena asaase yi do, na wondzi mu gua; na, hwɛ asaase yi dɔɔ so ara yie ma hɔn; hom mma yɛmfa hɔn mbabaa nwar hɔn, na wɔmma hɛn so yɛmfa hɛn mbabaa mma hɔn. 22Na adze ara a ogyina do a mbanyin no bɛgye hɛn pen na wɔnye hɛn atsena, ma yaayɛ ɔman kor nye dɛ, hɛn mu mbanyin nyinara botwitwa twatsia, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn woetwitwa no. 23Ana nkyɛ hɔn anyɛmbowa nye hɔn ahodze nye hɔn mbowa nyinara nnkɛyɛ hɛndze bi a? Hom mma yɛngye hɔn pen ara, na wɔnye hɛn bɛtsena. 24Na hɔn a wɔnam Hamor no kurow n’abotsenano pue nyinara, wotsiee ɔno na ne ba Sekem; na mbanyin a wɔnam no kurow n’abotsenano pue nyinara wotwitwaa hɔn twatsia. 25Na ɔbaa dɛ ne ndaansa no a ne yaw kitsaa hɔn no, nna Jakob ne mbabanyin beenu, Simeon nye Levi, Dina no nuanom no, wɔfefaa hɔn mfowa, na wokefiir kurow no awora, na wokunkum mbanyin no nyinara. 26Na wɔdze afona anomu kum Hamor nye ne ba Sekem, na wɔfaa Dina fii Sekem ne fie, na wɔdze no kɔree. 27Jakob ne mbabanyin no baa atɔfo no do na wɔbɔfoom kurow no mu ndzɛmba, osiandɛ woegu hɔn akyerɛbaa no ho fi. 28Wɔfaa hɔn nguan nye hɔn anantwi, nye hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ nye dza ɔwɔ kurow no mu, na dza ɔwɔ haban mu; 29na hɔn ahodze nyinara. Wɔfaa hɔn mbofraba nyinara nye hɔn yernom ndɔmmum, na wɔfoom hɔn, mekyerɛ dza ɔwɔ fie nyinara. 30Na Jakob see Simeon nye Levi dɛ, Hom afona me, dɛ hom ama mo ho abɔn wɔ hɔn a wɔtse asaase yi do hɔn mu, wɔ Keenanfo nye Perizfo hɔn mu: na mo ho suar ntsi, wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano aba mo do, na woeboku me; na wɔbɛsɛɛ me, emi nye me fi. 31Na wɔsee dɛ, Na nkyɛ ɔnyɛ hɛn akyerɛbaa dɛ edwaman a?

Title: GYENESIS 35
Content:
Nyankopɔn Hyira Jakob Wɔ Bɛtɛl
1 Na Nyankopɔn see Jakob dɛ, Soɛr, kɔ Bɛtɛl, na kɛtsena hɔ: na yɛ afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ ma Nyankopɔn a oyii noho kyerɛɛ wo wɔ aber a ifii wo nua Esau n’enyim guanee no. 2Nna Jakob see ne fifo nye hɔn a wɔnye no wɔ hɔ nyinara dɛ, Hom ntow enyame ananaben a ɔwɔ hom mu no ngu, na hom ntsew homho, na hom nsesa hom ntar: 3na hom mma yɛnsoɛr, na yɛnkɔ Bɛtɛl; na mebɛyɛ afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ ama Nyankopɔn a m’ahohia da no ɔgyee me do, na odzii m’ekyir wɔ kwan a mutui no mu no. 4Na wɔdze hɔn enyame ananaben a ɔwɔ hɔn nsamu nyinara, nye nkaba a ɔhyehyɛ hɔn asomu no maa Jakob; na Jakob dze hyɛɛ esudur no a ɔwɔ Sekem ho no ase. 5Na wɔkɔree: na ihu kɛsenara tɔɔ nkurow a wɔabɔ hɔn ho aprɔw no do, ma woenntsiw Jakob ne mbabanyin no. 6Na Jakob baa Luz a ɔwɔ Keenan asaase do no, (ɔnoara nye Bɛtɛl), ɔno nye nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho nyinara. 7Na osii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ, na ɔfrɛɛ bea no El-Bɛtɛl: osiandɛ hɔ na Nyankopɔn yii noho kyerɛɛ no wɔ aber a ofii no nua enyim guanee no. 8Na Debora, Rebeka no hwɛfo no wui, na wosiee no Bɛtɛl anaafo, wɔ esudur no ase: na wɔtoo ne dzin Allon-bakut a asekyerɛ nye Nyinsuwakyi bea.
9Na aber a Jakob fi Paddan-aram bae no, Nyankopɔn yii noho kyerɛɛ no bio, na ohyiraa no. 10 Na Nyankopɔn see no dɛ, Wo dzin dze Jakob: wɔnnkɛfrɛ wo dzin Jakob bio, na Israel bɛyɛ wo dzin: na ɔtoo ne dzin Israel. 11 Na Nyankopɔn see no dɛ, Emi nye Nyankopɔn Otumfo: wo mba na dɔr; ɔman nye amanaman asafo befi wo mu aba, na ahemfo befi w’asen mu epue. 12Asaase a medze memaa Abraham nye Isaak no, ɔwo na medze mebɛma wo, na w’asefo a wodzi w’ekyir no na medze asaase no bɛma hɔn. 13Na Nyankopɔn fii ne nkyɛn wɔ mbrɛ ɔnye no kasae no kɔr sor. 14 Na Jakob sii idum wɔ mbrɛ ɔnye no kasae no; ɔbo dum a: na ohuee ɔnom afɔr guu do, na ohuee ngo guu do. 15Na Jakob frɛɛ bea no a Nyankopɔn nye no kasae wɔ hɔ no ne dzin Bɛtɛl.
Rahel No Wu
16Na wofii Bɛtɛl sii mu; na aka ɔkwan kakra bi ma woedu Efrat no: awoo kaa Rahel, na n’awoo no mu yɛɛ dzen. 17Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a n’awoo no mu yɛɛ dzen no, nna awogyefo no see no dɛ, Mma nnsuro; ibenya babanyin kor so afei. 18Na ɔbaa dɛ, ne kra rifi no mu no (osiandɛ owui), ɔtoo no dzin Ben-oni; na n’egya dze ɔfrɛɛ no Benjamin. 19Na Rahel wui, na wosiee no wɔ Efrat kwan mu, a ɔnoara nye Bɛtlɛhɛm. 20Na Jakob sii ne nda do idum: ɔnoara nye Rahel ne nda do idum dze bodu ndɛ da yi. 21Na Israel tui, na ɔkɔbɔɔ n’asesee wɔ Eder abantsentsen ekyir noho. 22 Na ɔbaa dɛ, Israel tse asaase no do no, nna Reuben kɔree na ɔnye n’egya n’abaawayer Bilha kɛdae: na Israel tsee.
Jakob Ne Mbabanyin
(1 Mbermunsɛm 2.1-2)
Afei Jakob ne mbabanyin yɛ duebien: 23Leah ne mba; Jakob n’abakan Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Juda Isakar, nye Zebulun: 24Rahel ne mba; Josef nye Benjamin: 25na Rahel n’abaawa Bilha ne mba; Dan nye Naftali: 26na Leah n’abaawa Zilpa ne mba; Gad nye Aser. Woyinom nye Jakob ne mbabanyin a wɔwoo hɔn maa no wɔ Paddan-aram. 27 Na Jakob baa n’egya Isaak nkyɛn wɔ Mamre, wɔ Kiriat-arba (ɔnoara nye Hebron), mbrɛ Abraham nye Isaak bɛtsenae no. 28Na Isaak ne nda yɛɛ mfe ɔha eduowɔtwe. 29Na Isaak gyaa no sunsum mu, na owui, na otsiiw ne nananom wɔ samanadze, a nna ɔayɛ akɔdaa a oedzi mfe pii: na ne mba Esau nye Jakob siee no.

Title: GYENESIS 36
Content:
Esau Asefo
(1 Mbermunsɛm 1.34-37)
1Afei iyinom nye Esau (ɔnoara nye Edom) n’ebusuasantsen. 2 Esau waar ne yernom wɔ Keenan mbabaa mu; Hetnyi Elon ne babaa Ada, nye Hivinyi Zibeon ne babaa Ana ne babaa Oholibama; 3 na Ismael ne babaa Basemat, Nebaiot n’akyerɛbaa no. 4Na Ada woo Elifaz maa Esau; na Basemat woo Reuel; 5na Oholibama woo Jeus, Jalam, nye Kora: woyinom nye Esau ne mba a wɔwoo hɔn wɔ Keenan asaase do no. 6Na Esau faa ne yernom, ne mbabanyin, ne mbabaa, ne fie nyimpa nyinara, nye fiembowa, nye no mbowa nyinara, nye n’enyadze a onyaa no wɔ Keenan asaase do nyinara; na ɔtwee noho wɔ no nua Jakob ho kɔr asaase bi do. 7Osiandɛ hɔn ahodze so dodow ma hɔn dɛ wɔbɛtsena fakor. Na asaase a wɔtse do no wɔnnsen do wɔ hɔn mbowa no ntsi. 8Na Esau a noara so nye Edom no tsenaa Seir bepɔw do. 9Na iyinom nye Esau, Edomfo a wɔtse Seir bepɔw do hɔn egya no, n’ebusuasantsen: 10Esau ne mbabanyin hɔn edzin nye yi; Elifaz, Esau ne yer Ada ne ba no, Reuel, Esau ne yer Basemat ne ba no. 11Na Elifaz ne mba nye Teman, Omar, Zefo, Gatam, nye Kenaz. 12Na Esau ne ba Elifaz no nwewe nye Timna; na ɔwoo Amalek maa Elifaz. Woyinom nye Esau ne yer Ada n’asefo. 13Na Reuel ne mba nye woyinom; Nahat, Zera, Samma, nye Miza. Woyinom nye Esau ne yer Basemat ne mba. 14Na woyinom nye Esau ne yer Oholibama, Zibeon ne babaa Ana ne babaa no ne mba; na ɔwoo Jeus, Jalam, nye Kora maa Esau. 15Woyinom nye Esau ne mba mu ekunyin: Esau n’abakan Elifaz ne mba; ekunyin Teman, Omar, Zefo, Kenaz, 16Kora, Gatam, na Amalek. Woyinom nye ekunyin a wofi Elifaz no mu puei wɔ Edom asaase do; na woyinom nye Ada n’asefo. 17Na Esau ne ba Reuel ne mba nye woyinom; ekunyin Nahat, Zera, Samma, nye Miza: woyinom nye ekunyin a wofi Reuel mu puei wɔ Edom asaase do; woyinom nye Esau ne yer Basemat ne mba. 18Na woyinom nye Esau ne yer Oholibama ne mba; ekunyin Jeus, Jalam, na okunyin Kora. Woyinom nye ekunyin a wofi Esau ne yer Oholibama, Ana ne babaa no no mu puei. 19Woyinom nye Esau a ɔnoara nye Edom no n’asefo, na woyinom nye hɔn ekunyin.
Seir Asefo
(1 Mbermunsɛm 1.38-42)
20Woyinom nye Hornyi Seir ne mba a nna wɔyɛ asaase no do mba no. Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana, 21Dison, Ezer nye Disan. Woyinom nye ekunyin a wofi Horfo, Seir ne mba no hɔn mu puei, wɔ Edom asaase do. 22Na Lotan ne mba nye Hori na Heman. Nna Lotan n’akyerɛbaa nye Timna. 23Na Sobal ne mba nye woyinom; Alvan, Manahat, Ebal, Sefo nye Onam. 24Na woyinom nye Zibeon ne mba; Aia nye Ana: oyi nye Ana a, mber a ɔhwɛ n’egya Zibeon no nsoasopɔnkɔ no okohun nsuhyew mpumpunadze wɔ sar do no. 25Na woyinom nye Ana ne mba; Dison na Oholibama, Ana ne babaa no. 26Na woyinom nye Dison ne mba; Hemdan, Esban, Itran nye Keran. 27Ezer ne mba nye woyinom; Bilhan, Zaavan nye Akan. 28Dison ne mba nye woyinom: Uz nye Aran. 29Ekunyin a wofi Horfo mu puei nye woyinom; ekunyin Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, na Ana, 30Dison, Ezer, na Disan. Ekunyin a wofi Horfo mu puei nye woyinom dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ekunyinyɛ tsetsee wɔ Seir asaase do.
Edom Ahemfo
(1 Mbermunsɛm 1.43-54)
31Na ahemfo a wodzi hen wɔ Edom asaase do, ansaana obiara ridzi Israelmba do hen no nye woyinom. 32Na Beor ne ba Bela dzii hen wɔ Edom; na no kurow dzin dze Din-haba. 33Na Bela wui, na Zera a ofi Bozra ne ba Jobab bedzii n’adze. 34Na Jobab wui, na Husam a ofi Temanfo hɔn asaase do bedzii n’adze. 35Na Husam wui no Hadad, Bedad a okum Midian wɔ Moab haban mu no, ne ba no bedzii n’adze: na no kurow ne dzin dze Avit. 36Na Hadad wui, na Samla a ofi Masreka bedzii n’adze. 37Na Samla wui no Saul a ofi Rehobot a ɔwɔ Esutsen no ho no bedzii n’adze. 38Na Saul wui, na Akbor ba Baal-hanan bedzii n’adze. 39Na Akbor ne ba Baal-hanan wui no, Hadar bedzii n’adze: na no kurow ne dzin dze Pau; na ne yer ne dzin dze Mehetabel, Me-zahab ne babaa Matred ne babaa a. 40Na ekunyin a wofi Esau mu puei hɔn edzin nye yi; dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua, hɔn tsenabew, nye hɔn edzin tsetsee, ekunyin Timna, Alva, Jetet; 41Oholibama, Ela na okunyin Pinon; 42Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar; 43Magdiel, Iram. Woyinom nye Edom ekunyin, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn tsenabew tsetsee wɔ asaase a ɔyɛ hɔn enyadze no do. Oyi nye Esau, Edomfo hɔn egya no.

Title: GYENESIS 37
Content:
Josef Na No Nuanom
1Na Jakob tsenaa asaase a n’egya tsenaa do no do, Keenan asaase do. 2Iyi nye Jakob n’ebusua ho abakɔsɛm. Josef dzii mfe duesuon no, nna ɔnye no nuanom rohwɛ nguan no; na ɔyɛ abofra a ɔnye n’egya ne yernom Bilha nye Zilpa hɔn mba na wɔwɔ hɔ: na Josef kɛkaa hɔn ho asɛmbɔn kyerɛɛ hɔn egya. 3Afei nna Israel dɔ Josef sen ne mba nyinara, osiandɛ ɔno nye no nkɔdaaber mu ba: na ɔyɛɛ asaasaaba atar fɛfɛɛfɛw bi maa no. 4Na no nuanom no hun dɛ hɔn egya dɔ no sen hɔn nyinara no wɔtaan no, na woenntum annkasa abodwee do annkyerɛ no. 5Na Josef soo daa, na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no nuanom no na nkyii wɔtaan no kɛse. 6Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Meserɛ hom, hom ntsie daa a maso yi: 7na hwɛ, nna yɛrekyekyer ewifua ekuwekuw wɔ haban mu, na, hwɛ, mo kuw no soɛree, na ogyinaa tsentsen; na, hwɛ, hom ekuw no botwaa me dze no ho hyiae, na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze maa no. 8Na no nuanom bisaa no dɛ, Nna tserɛ ampaara dɛ ibedzi hɛn do hen nye no? Ana tserɛ ampaara dɛ ibenya hɛn do tum nye no? Na nkyii wɔtaan no kɛse wɔ n’adaaso no nye ne nsɛm no ntsi. 9Na ɔsoo daa kor so, na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no nuanom, na ɔsee dɛ, Hwɛ, maso daa bio; na, hwɛ, ewia nye bosoom nye nworaba dubiako robɔ hɔn mu adze ma me. 10Na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ n’egya nye no nuanom; na n’egya twuuw n’enyim, na ɔsee no dɛ, Ebɛn daa na aso yi? Nna tserɛ ampaara dɛ emi nye wo na nye wo nuanom bɛba abɔbɔ hɛn mu adze wɔ famu ama wo nye no? 11 Na no nuanom enyi beer no do; na n’egya dze ɔdze asɛm no too ne tsirmu.
Israel Soma Josef Kɔ No Nuanom Nkyɛn
12Na no nuanom kɔree kɔhwɛɛ hɔn egya no nguan wɔ Sekem. 13Na Israel see Josef dɛ, Ana wo nuanom nnyɛn mbowa wɔ Sekem bi a? Bra ma monsoma wo hɔn hɔ. Na ɔsee no dɛ, Emi nye yi. 14Na Israel see no dɛ, Afei kɔ, kɔhwɛ dɛ wo nuanom, nye nguan no hɔn ho ye; na san bɛka kyerɛ me. Nna ofi Hebron bɔnsa mu somaa no ma ɔbaa Sekem. 15Na banyin bi hun no dɛ, orikyin haban no mu: na banyin no bisaa no dɛ, Erohwehwɛ ebɛnadze? 16Na ɔsee dɛ, Morohwehwɛ mo nuanom: meserɛ wo ara, kyerɛ me mbrɛ wɔwɔ rohwɛ nguan no. 17Na banyin no see dɛ, Woefi ha kɔ: na metsee dɛ wɔreka dɛ, Wɔmma yɛnkɔ Dotan. Na Josef tsiiw no nuanom, na okohun hɔn wɔ Dotan. 18Na no nuanom no hun no ekyirkyiikyir, na ansaana ɔrebɛn hɔn no, wɔkɔr ne tsir do apam dɛ woboku no. 19Na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ, Wɔnhwɛ, ɔdaasofo no na ɔreba no. 20Dɛm ntsi afei wɔmbra, wɔmma yenku no, na yɛntow no nkyen mona yi bi mu, na yɛnkɛse dɛ, Abowa bɔn bi na ɔatsetsew no mu: na nkyii yɛnhwɛ mbrɛ n’adaaso no bowie. 21Na Reuben tsee, na ɔgyee no wɔ hɔn nsamu; na ɔsee dɛ, Mma wɔmma yennku no; 22Mma hom nnka bɔgya: wɔmfa no nto sar do ha mona yi mu, na mma wɔmmfa nsa nnka no: ɔreyɛ ama nkyɛ ɔaagye no wɔ hɔn nsamu dze no asan akɛma n’egya. 23Na ɔbaa dɛ, Josef dur no nuanom no nkyɛn no, wɔpɔɔr, asaasaaba atar fɛɛfɛw a ɔhyɛ no no 24na wɔdze no kɔtoo mona mu: nna mona no mu awew a, nsu nnyi mu.
Wɔtɔn Josef Kɔ Egypt
25Na wɔtsenaa famu dɛ woridzidzi no wɔmaa hɔn enyiwa do na wohun Ismaelfo akwantufo kuw bi dɛ wofi Gilead reba, wɔnye hɔn efumpɔnkɔ a wɔsoso eduhuam nye ngo nye mɛɛr dze rokɔ Egypt. 26Na Juda see no nuanom no dɛ, Sɛ yeku hɛn nua na yesiw no bɔgyaa do a, ebɛn mfaso na ɔwɔ mu? 27Hom mbra ma yɛntɔn no mma Ismaelfo yi, na mma wɔmma yɛmmfa hɛn nsa nnka no; osiandɛ hɛn nua a, hɛn bɔgyaa a. Na no nuanom no tsiee no. 28Nna Midianfo eguadzifo bi rutwa mu; na woyii Josef fii mona no mu, na wɔtɔɔn no maa Ismaelfo no gyee ndwetɛbona eduonu. Na wɔdze Josef kɔr Egypt. 29Na ber a Reuben sanee baa mona no do no; hwɛ, nna Josef nnyi mona no mu; na osunsuaan ne ntar mu. 30Na ɔsanee kɔr no nuanom no nkyɛn, na ɔsee dɛ, Abofra no nnyi hɔ; na iyi mara merefa hen? 31Na wɔfaa Josef n’atar no, na wokum apɔnkyenyin, na wɔdze atar no bɔɔ bɔgya no mu; 32na wɔdze asaasaaba atar fɛfɛɛfɛw no somae ma wɔdze kɛmaa hɔn egya, kɛsee no dɛ, Adze a yeehu nye yi: hwɛ kyerɛ dɛ wo ba n’atar a. 33Na ɔhwɛe, na ɔsee dɛ, Me ba n’atar a; abowa bɔn bi na ɔakyer no; tsetsew na wɔatsetsew Josef no mu. 34Na Jakob sunsuaan n’atar mu, na ɔdze kɔben tam bɔɔ n’asen, na osuu ne ba nda pii. 35Na ne mbabanyin nye ne mbabaa nyinara bae dɛ wɔrebɛkyekye no werɛ; naaso oenntsie ma wɔannkyekye no werɛ; na ɔsee dɛ, Mibedzi yaw ara dze akɔ me ba nkyɛn wɔ samanadze. Na n’egya suu no. 36Na Midianfo no kɔtɔɔn no wɔ Egypt maa Potifar, Farao no somfo bi a ɔno nye abrafohen no.

Title: GYENESIS 38
Content:
Juda Na Tamar
1Na ɔbaa dɛ, aber no ara mu na Juda fii no nuanom nkyɛn kɔree, na ɔkɛtsenaa Adullamnyi bi a ne dzin dze Hira ne nkyɛn. 2Na Juda hun Keenannyi bi a ne dzin dze Sua ne babaa bi wɔ hɔ; na ɔwaar no, na ɔnye no dae. 3Na onyinsenii, na ɔwoo babanyin; na ɔfrɛɛ no Er. 4Na onyinseen bio, na ɔwoo babanyin; na ɔfrɛɛ no Onan. 5Na ɔwoo babanyin bio, na ɔfrɛɛ no Sela: na aber a ɔwoo no no nna ɔwɔ Kezib. 6Na Juda gyee yer maa n’abakan Er, na ne dzin dze Tamar. 7Na Juda n’abakan Er yɛɛ bɔn wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na EWURADZE kum no. 8Na Juda see Onan dɛ, Kɔ wo nua ne yer nkyɛn, na fa no kunabaa, na wo mba ma wo nua. 9Na Onan nyim dɛ mba no nnkɛyɛ nedze; na ɔbaa dɛ, aber biara a ɔkɔr no nua ne yer nkyɛn no, ɔmaa no ho nsu no guu famu, amma ɔaamma no nua mba. 10Na dza ɔyɛe no yɛ bɔn wɔ EWURADZE enyim: na okum no so. 11Nna Juda see n’asew Tamar dɛ, Tsena ekunayɛ mu wɔ w’egya fie kɛpem dɛ me ba Sela benyin: osuro dɛ, bɛyɛ na no so oewu dɛ no nuanom no. Na Tamar kɔree na ɔkɛtsenaa n’egya fie. 12Na ɔwɔ hɔ wɔ hɔ nna Juda ne yer a ɔyɛ Sua ne babaa no, owui. Na Juda no werɛ kyekyeree no, ɔkɔr no nguansusuafo nkyɛn wɔ Timna, ɔno nye ne nyɛnko Adullamnyi Hira. 13Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Tamar dɛ, Hwɛ, w’asew rokɔ Timna ekosusua no nguan ho nhwi. 14Na oyii no kuna ntar wɔ no ho, na ɔdze ne nkataenyim kataa n’enyim, na ɔkataa noho kɛtsenaa Enaim abotsenano, wɔ Timna kwan nkyɛn; osiandɛ ohun dɛ Sela enyin, naaso Juda ammfa no amma no awar. 15Na Juda hun no no, obuu no dɛ edwaman a, osiandɛ ɔakata n’enyim. 16Na ɔmanee kɔr ne nkyɛn wɔ kwan no ne nkyɛn, na ɔsee dɛ, Bra, meserɛ wo, ma membra wo nkyɛn: nna onnyim dɛ n’asew no a. Na Tamar bisaa no dɛ, Ebɛnadze na edze bɛma me, na enye me ada? 17Na ɔsee dɛ, Mebɛma wɔdze apɔnkyeba fi mbowa no mu abrɛ wo. Na obisaa no dɛ, Ebɛma me ahobadze bi ma ɔdze ekodu dɛ ebɛma wɔdze aba? 18Na Juda bisaa no dɛ, Ebɛn ahobadze na memfa mma wo? Na ɔsee dɛ, Wo nsɔwanokaba nye w’ahoma, nye wo poma a okitsa wo nsamu no. Na Juda dze maa no, na ɔnye no dae, na ɔnye no nyinsenii. 19Na Tamar soɛree kɔree, na oyii ne nkataenyim no wɔ no ho, na ɔfaa no kuna ntar hyɛe. 20Na Juda dze apɔnkyeba no maa ne nyɛnko Adullamnyi no, dɛ ɔmfa nkɛgye ahobadze no wɔ ɔbaa no nsa mu: naaso oennhu no. 21Nna obisaa no kuromfo no dɛ, edwaman a ɔtse Enaim kwan nkyɛn no wɔ hen? Na wɔsee dɛ, Edwaman biara mmbaa ha. 22Na ɔsanee baa Juda hɔ, na ɔbɛsee dɛ, Mennhu no; na eso ekuromfo no see dɛ, Edwaman biara mmbaa ha. 23Na Juda see dɛ, Ma ɔmfa, ɔno bohu na hɛn enyim egu ase: hwɛ, memaa wɔdze apɔnkyeba yi kɔree, na ennhu no. 24Na ɔbaa dɛ odzii bɛyɛ abosoom ebiasa n’ekyir no, wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Juda dɛ, W’asew Tamar abɔ edwaman, na hwɛ, ɔnam n’edwaman mu enyinsen so. Na Juda see dɛ, Hom nkɛfa no mbra ma wɔnhyew no. 25Na wɔkɛfaa no bae no, nna Tamar somae ma wɔkɛsee n’asew no dɛ, banyin a ndzɛmba yi yɛ nedze no, ɔno na menye no nyinsen: ntsi, Meserɛ wo, hwehwɛ nyia ndzɛmba yi yɛ nedze, nsɔwanokaba, nye ahoma, nye poma yi. 26Na Juda hun dɛ noara nedze a, na ɔsee dɛ, ɔtsen sen me; susuampa dɛ mammfa no amma me ba Sela ntsi. Na ɔnye no annda bio. 27Na ɔbaa no n’awoo durii no, na, hwɛ, nta na wɔwɔ ne yamu. 28Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a ɔrowo no, nna kor dze ne nsa puei; na awogyefo no faa ahoma memen dze kyekyeer ne nsa dɛ, Oyi na odzii kan puei. 29Na ɔbaa dɛ, ɔtwee ne nsa kɔdɔɔ mu, na, hwɛ, no nua puei; na ɔwogyefo no see dɛ, ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na atsew mu aba yi? Dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Perez. 30Na n’ekyir no na nyia ahoma memen kyekyer ne nsa no bae: na wɔfrɛɛ no Zera.

Title: GYENESIS 39
Content:
Josef Wɔ Potifar Fie
1Na wɔdze Josef kɔr Egypt, na Potifar, Farao no somfo a ɔyɛ n’abrafohen no, tɔɔ no wɔ Ismaelfo a wɔdze no kɔr hɔ no hɔn nsamu. 2 Na EWURADZE dzii Josef n’ekyir na ɔyɛɛ siar wɔ no wura Egyptnyi no ne fie. 3Na no wura hun dɛ EWURADZE nye no nam, na EWURADZE maa dza ɔyɛɛ no nyinara yɛɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ ne nsamu. 4Na Josef nyaa n’enyim enyimnyam, na ɔsoom no: na ɔyɛɛ no panyin wɔ ne fie, na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara hyɛɛ ne nsa. 5Na ɔbaa dɛ ofitsi aber a ɔyɛɛ no panyin wɔ ne fie, na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara hyɛɛ ne nsa no, Josef ntsi EWURADZE hyiraa Egyptnyi no ne fie; na EWURADZE ne nhyira baa dza ɔwɔ nyinara do, dza ɔwɔ fie nye dza ɔwɔ haban mu. 6Na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara hyɛɛ Josef ne nsa; nna noara nnyim dza ɔwɔ no hɔ gyedɛ edziban a ɔnoara dzi. Nna Josef no ho yɛ fɛw, na n’enyim wɔ nyam. 7Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom ekyir no, no wura ne yer no dze n’enyi sii Josef do; na ɔsee dɛ, Enye me nda. 8Na ɔpowee, na ɔsee no wura ne yer no dɛ, Hwɛ, mo wura nnyim dza ɔwɔ mo hɔ wɔ fie ha, na ɔdze dza ɔwɔ nyinara ahyɛ me nsa; 9obiara nnyɛ kɛse nnkyɛn me wɔ fie ha; nkyii so ɔnnkam me biribiara ka wo ho, osiandɛ eyɛ ne yer: na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na mebɛyɛ emumuyɛ kɛse yi, na mayɛ bɔn etsia Nyankopɔn? 10Na ɔbaa dɛ, daa daa nyinara ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Josef, naaso ɔanngye no pen, dɛ ɔnye no bɛda, anaa ɔnye no bɛyɛ biribi. 11Na ɔbaa dɛ aber yi mu no ɔkɔr fie hɔ dɛ ɔrekɛyɛ n’edwuma; nna fie no mu nyimpa no mu biara nnyi hɔ 12na basia no suoo n’atar mu, dɛ, Enye me nda: na Josef gyaa n’atar no wɔ ne nsamu, na oguanee puei. 13Na ɔbaa dɛ, ohun dɛ oegya n’atar no wɔ ne nsamu, na oeguan epue no, 14ɔfrɛfrɛɛ no nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ne fie no, na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ, Wɔnhwɛ, ɔakɛfa Hebriwnyi aba ma oribesi hɛn atwetwe; ɔbaa me nkyɛn dɛ ɔnye me rebɛda, na medze ndze kɛse kekaa mu: 15na ɔbaa dɛ aber a ɔtsee dɛ memaa me ndze do na mekekaa mu no, nna ɔdaan n’atar gyaa me nkyɛn, na oguanee puei. 16Na ɔdze n’atar no guu ne nkyɛn ara ma okodur dɛ no wura baa fie. 17Na ɔkaa no dɛmara kyerɛɛ no dɛ, Akowaa Hebriwnyi a edze no brɛɛ hɛn no, ɔbaa me nkyɛn dɛ orubogu mo ho fi 18na ɔbaa dɛ, memaa me ndze do, na mekekaa mu no, nna ɔdaan n’atar gyaa me nkyɛn, na oguanee puei. 19Na aber a no wura tsee ne yer ne nsɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ, Mbrɛ w’akowaa ayɛ me nye yi no; no bo fuuw kɛsenara. 20Na Josef no wura faa no dze no kɔtoo efiadze, beebi mbrɛ ɔhen n’adaduafo gu no: na ɔdaa efiadze hɔ. 21 Na EWURADZE dzii Josef n’ekyir, na ɔdoom no, na ɔmaa onyaa efiadzehwɛfo no n’enyim enyimnyam. 22Na efiadzehwɛfo no dze adaduafo a wɔwɔ efiadze hɔ no nyinara hyɛɛ Josef ne nsa; na biribiara a wɔyɛɛ no wɔ hɔ no, ɔnoara na ɔhwɛe. 23Efiadzehwɛfo no annhaw no ho wɔ dza ɔdze hyɛɛ ne nsa mu no mu biara ho, osiandɛ EWURADZE nye no nam; na biribiara a ɔyɛe no, EWURADZE maa ɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm.

Title: GYENESIS 40
Content:
Josef Kyerɛ Ndaduafo Adaaso Ase
1Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom ekyir no, Egypthen ne nsahyɛfo nye ne paanootofo no foom hɔn wura Egypthen no. 2Na Farao no bo fuuw n’asomfo beenu no, nsahyɛfo panyin no, nye paanootofo panyin no. 3Na ɔdze hɔn koguu efiadze wɔ abrafohen no ne fie, wɔ efiadze beebi mbrɛ Josef da no no mu. 4Na abrafohen no dze hɔn hyɛɛ Josef ne nsa, na ɔsoom hɔn: na wɔkyɛɛr efiadze hɔ mber kakra. 5Na hɔn beenu nyina sosoo daa, anafua da kor a ɔsor obiara ne daa, nye ne nkyerɛasee. 6Na Josef baa hɔn nkyɛn anapa no, obohun hɔn dɛ wɔabombɔm. 7Na obisaa Farao n’asomfo a wɔnye no gu efiadze hɔ no dɛ, ɔyɛ dɛn na ndɛ hom abombɔm dɛm yi? 8Na wɔsee no dɛ, Yɛasoso daa, naaso yennya obi ma ɔnnkyerɛ hɛn ase. Na Josef see hɔn dɛ, Ana nnyɛ Nyankopɔn na ɔma nkyerɛase bi a? Meserɛ hom, hom nka nkyerɛ me. 9Na nsahyɛfo panyin no kaa n’adaaso kyerɛɛ Josef, na ɔsee no dɛ, M’adaaso mu, hwɛ, wenyindua si m’enyim; 10na nkorbata ebiasa wɔ wenyindua no ho: na ɔyɛ dɛ ɔafefɛw, na ɔabɔ nhyiren; na no do nsiansiaw asow wenyinamba a ɔaber: 11na Farao no kɔɔpow kitsa me nsamu, na metsetseew wenyinamba no, na mikyii guu Farao no kɔɔpow mu, na medze kɔɔpow no hyɛɛ Farao ne nsa. 12Na Josef see no dɛ, Ne nkyerɛase nye yi; nkorbata ebiasa no ɔyɛ ndaansa. 13Aka ndaansa ma Farao eyi wo efi ha na ɔama ekedzi wo dzibew bio: na edze Farao no kɔɔpow bɛhyɛ ne nsa, dɛ nkyɛ kan no a eyɛ ne nsahyɛfo no. 14Na sɛ inya beebi si a, ɔno kaa me, na yɛ me ayamuyie, meserɛ wo, na bɔ me dzin kyerɛ Farao, na beyi me fi dan yi mu: 15na owia na wowiaa me wɔ Hebriwfo asaase do: na ha so mennyɛɛ biribiara a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze me to efiadze. 16Na aber a paanootofo panyin no hun dɛ nkyerɛase no ye no, ɔsee Josef dɛ, Mo so m’adaaso mu no, muhun dɛ paanoo fufuw nkɛntsɛn ebiasa sisi m’etsifi: 17na kɛntsɛn a odzi sor no adɔkɔdɔkɔdze a wɔto ma Farao nyinara bi wɔ mu; na nnoma ridzi no kɛntsɛn no mu wɔ m’etsifi. 18Na Josef buae na ɔsee dɛ, Ne nkyerɛase nye yi: nkɛntsɛn ebiasa no yɛ ndaansa: 19na aka ndaansa ma Farao eyi wo tsir wɔ wo do, na wɔasɛn wo wɔ dua do ma nnoma edzi wo nam efi wo ho. 20Na ɔbaa dɛ ne ndaansa no a ɔyɛ Farao n’awoda no, ɔtoo pon maa no nkowaa nyinara: na oyii nsahyɛfo panyin no nye paanootofo panyin no fii efiadze dze hɔn baa no nkowaa no enyim. 21Na ɔmaa nsahyɛfo panyin no sanee yɛɛ ne nsahyɛdwuma no bio; na ɔdze kɔɔpow no hyɛɛ Farao ne nsa: 22na paanootofo panyin no dze, ɔsɛɛn no: dɛ mbrɛ Josef kyerɛɛ hɔn ase no ara. 23Naaso nsahyɛfo panyin no annkaa Josef, na no werɛ fiir no.

Title: GYENESIS 41
Content:
Josef Kyerɛ Farao N’adaaso Ase
1Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe ebien ekyir no, Farao soo daa: na ohun dɛ nna ogyina esutsen Nael no ho. 2Na ohun dɛ anantwiber esuon a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw na wɔadɔ seradze, fi esutsen no mu puei; na wobedzidzii wɔ sar no do. 3Na hwɛ, anantwiber esuon afofor so fi esutsen no mu dzi hɔn ekyir puei a hɔn ho yɛ tantan na wɔafomfɔn; na wobegyinaa anantwiber esuon no nkyɛn wɔ esutsen no no kɔn do. 4Na anantwiber esuon a hɔn ho yɛ tantan na wɔafomfɔn no, memeen anantwiber esuon a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw na wɔadodɔ seradze no. Nna Farao nyanee. 5Na ɔdae na ɔsoo daa bio: na ohun dɛ, eburow mbɛtsem esuon efifir eburonan kor do, amaama na oye. 6Na hwɛ, mbɛtsem esuon a ɔyɛ nkɔkɔr na boka mframa enyinyam no fifirii dzii hɔn ekyir. 7Na mbɛtsem nkɔkɔr no memeen mbɛtsem esuon a eburow wɔ mu na ɔyɛ amaama no. Na Farao nyanee, na, hwɛ, adaaso a. 8 Na ɔbaa dɛ anapa no, n’ahom annka noho; na ɔsomae ma wɔkɛfrɛfrɛɛ Egypt nkongyaayifo nyinara, nye enyansafo a wɔwɔ hɔ nyinara ma wɔbae: na Farao kaa n’adaaso no kyerɛɛ hɔn; naaso obiara enntum annkyerɛ ase annkyerɛ no. 9Nna nsahyɛfo panyin no kaa kyerɛɛ Farao dɛ, Mekaa mo mfom ndɛ: 10Farao no bo fuuw no nkowaa, emi nye paanootofo panyin no: na ɔdze hɛn koguu efiadze wɔ abrafohen no ne fie, 11na yɛsosoo daa anafua da kor, emi nye paanotonyi no; a ɔsor obiara ne daa nye mbrɛ ne nkyerɛase tse. 12Na yɛkaa kyerɛɛ Hebriwnyi aberantsɛ bi, abrafohen no n’akowaa a nna ɔnye hɛn wɔ hɔ no, na ɔkyerɛɛ hɛn daa no ase; dɛ mbrɛ ɔbaako ne daa tse no ara na ɔkyerɛɛ no ase. 13Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔyɛɛ hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔkyerɛɛ hɛn ase no ara; emi emaa mikedzii me dzibew, na ɔno esɛɛn no. 14Na Farao somae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ Josef, na wɔyɛɛ ntsɛm dze no fii efiadze no mu hɔ puei: na osusuae, na ɔsesaa n’atar, na ɔbaa Farao hɔ. 15Na Farao see Josef dɛ, Maso daa, na obiara nnyi hɔ a otum kyerɛ ase: na ɔwo na matse wo nka dɛ, etse daa a, ekyerɛ ase. 16Na Josef buaa Farao dɛ, Onnyi mo mu: Nyankopɔn na ɔbɛma Farao asomdwee mbuae. 17Na Farao kaa kyerɛɛ Josef dɛ, M’adaaso mu no, hwɛ, nna migyina esutsen Nael no kɔn do: 18na muhun dɛ anantwiber esuon a wɔadɔ seradze na hɔn ho yɛ fɛw fi nsu no mu bae; na wobedzidzii sar no do: 19na hwɛ, anantwiber esuon afofor so dzi hɔn ekyir bae a wɔyɛ mbɔbɔr na hɔn ho tantanntan nkamfenkamfe, a munnhun hɔn ho ne tantan ne saso wɔ Egypt asaase nyinara do da: 20na anantwiber a wɔyɛ nkamfenkamfe na hɔn ho tantan no memeen anantwiber esuon a wɔadɔ seradze a wodzii kan no. 21Na aber a wowiee hɔn memen no, obi ennhu dɛ woewie hɔn men: osiandɛ nna hɔn ho da ho ara yɛ tantan dɛ nkan no ara so bio. Nna minyanee. 22Na muhun wɔ m’adaaso mu bio, na hwɛ, mbɛtsem esuon efifir eburonan kor do, amaama na oye: 23na muhun dɛ mbɛtsem esuon a enyinyam, na ɔyɛ nkɔkɔr, na boka mframa ama woetwintwam fifirii, dzii hɔn ekyir: 24na mbɛtsem esuon nkɔkɔr no memeen mbɛtsem esuon a oye no. Mekaa kyerɛɛ nkongyaayifo no; naaso obiara nnyi hɔ a otumii kyerɛɛ me ase. 25Na Josef see Farao dɛ, Farao n’adaaso ebien no yɛ kor: dza Nyankopɔn rebɛyɛ na oeyi akyerɛ Farao no. 26Anantwiber pa esuon no yɛ mfe esuon; na mbɛtsem pa esuon no yɛ mfe esuon: daa no yɛ kor. 27Na anantwiber esuon a wɔafomfɔn na hɔn ho yɛ tantan no a wodzii hɔn ekyir bae no, yɛ ɔkɔm mfe esuon, mbɛtsem esuon nkɔkɔr a boka mframa ama enyinyam no so dɛmara; ɔbɛyɛ ɔkɔm mfe esuon. 28Ɔno nye asɛm a mekaa mekyerɛɛ Farao no; dɛ dza Nyankopɔn rebɛyɛ nna oeyi akyerɛ Farao no. 29Hwɛ, mfe esuon reba a edziban piinara bɛba Egypt asaase nyinara do: 30na ɔno n’ekyir no nna ɔkɔm mfe esuon bɔsoɛr; na werɛ befir edziban pii no nyinara wɔ Egypt asaase do; na ɔkɔm no bɛhyew asaase no; 31na osian ɔkɔm a odzi ekyir no ntsi wɔnnkɛkaa edziban pii no wɔ asaase no do; osiandɛ no mu bɛyɛ dzen dodow. 32Na sɛ adaaso no yɛɛ mbɔho ebien maa Farao a, nna ne siantsir nye dɛ, Nyankopɔn esi no pi, na Nyankopɔn bɛma ayɛ hɔ ntsɛntsɛm. 33Dɛm ntsi afei wɔmma Farao nhwehwɛ nyimpa a ɔyɛ ɔbadwembanyi nye onyansafo, na ɔnyɛ no panyin wɔ Egypt asaase do. 34Wɔmma Farao nyɛ iyi, na ɔnhyehyɛ ahwɛdofo wɔ asaase no do, na wɔngyegye Egypt asaase do edziban no mbumu enum enum wɔ mfe esuon a edziban pii wɔ mu no mu. 35Na wɔmma wɔmboaboa mfe pa a ɔreba yi no mu edziban nyinara ano, na wɔmfa eburow nhyehyɛ asan do wɔ Farao ne nsa ase, ma ɔnyɛ edziban wɔ nkurow no mu, na wɔmfa nsie. 36Na edziban no bɛyɛ dza wɔakora ama asaase no dze esie ɔkɔm mfe esuon a ɔbɛba Egypt asaase do no; amma asaase no aannsɛɛ wɔ ɔkɔm no mu.
Wɔhyɛ Josef Enyimnyam
37Na asɛm no yɛɛ Farao nye no nkowaa nyinara dɛw. 38Na Farao see no nkowaa dɛ, Ana yebenya nyimpa a ɔtse dɛ oyi, nyimpa a Nyankopɔn no sunsum wɔ no mu yi? 39Na Farao see Josef dɛ, Susuampa dɛ Nyankopɔn dze iyi nyinara akyerɛ wo yi, obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ ɔbadwembanyi nye onyansafo dɛ ɔwo: 40 ɔwo na ebɔhwɛ me fi yi do, na dza ebɛka no, dza me man nyinara bedzi do nye no; gyedɛ ahengua no nkotsee na medze mebɛsen wo. 41Na Farao see Josef dɛ, Hwɛ, mayɛ wo Egypt asaase nyinara do panyin. 42 Na Farao worɔɔw no nsɔwanonkaba wɔ ne nsa, na ɔdze hyɛɛ Josef ne nsa, na ɔhyɛɛ no ndwera pa ntar, na ɔdze sika ntweaban too no kɔn mu; 43na ɔmaa ɔtsenaa ne tseaseanam a otsia ebien no mu; na wɔpaa mu wɔ n’enyim dɛ, Obiara mbu nkotodwe; na ɔyɛɛ no Egypt asaase nyinara do panyin. 44Na Farao see Josef dɛ, Emi nye Farao, na obiara nnkokwetsir wo ayɛ biribiara wɔ Egypt asaase nyinara do. 45Na Farao frɛɛ Josef ne dzin Zafenat-panea; na ɔdze On ɔsɔfo Potifera ne babaa Asenat maa no awar. 46Na aber a Josef kopuee Egypthen Farao n’enyim no, nna oedzi mfe eduasa. Na Josef fii Farao n’enyim, na okekyimaa Egypt asaase nyinara do. 47Na bafuu mfe esuon no mu no, edziban baa asaase no do ma obuu do. 48Na ɔboaboaa mfe esuon edziban a ɔbaa Egypt asaase do no nyinara ano, na ɔdze siesiee nkurow no mu: nhaban a wɔabɔ nkurow no nyinara ho aprɔw no mu edziban na ɔdze siesiee nkurow no mu. 49Na Josef boaboaa eburow ano dɛ mpoano anhwea; ɔdɔɔ so dodow, ma nkyii ogyaa kan mpo; osiandɛ wobu ano a ɔnnyɛ yie. 50Wɔwoo mba beenu maa Josef ansaana ɔkɔm afe no rudu, hɔn a On ɔsɔfo Potifera ne babaa Asenat woo hɔn maa no no a. 51Na Josef frɛɛ abakan no ne dzin Manaasɛ: Na ɔsee dɛ, Nyankopɔn ama mo werɛ efir me berɛ nyinara, nye m’egya fie nyinara. 52Na nyia otsia ebien no ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Efraim: osiandɛ ɔsee dɛ Nyankopɔn ama mawo wɔ amandzehu asaase no do. 53Na ndɔbaa pii a ɔbaa Egypt asaase do mfe esuon no bɔɔ adze. 54 Na ɔkɔm mfe esuon hyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔreba, dɛ mbrɛ Josef see no ara; na ɔkɔm baa asaase nyinara do: nna Egypt asaase nyinara do dze, edziban wɔ hɔ. 55 Na ɔkɔm kaa Egypt asaase nyinara no, ɔman no sui tɔɔ Farao do gyee edziban: na Farao see Egyptfo no nyinara dɛ, Hom nkɔ Josef hɔ; dza ɔbɛse hom no, hom nyɛ. 56Na ɔkɔm no baa asaase nyinara do, na Josef buebuee mbrɛ edziban wɔ no nyinara, na ɔtɔnee maa Egyptfo no; na ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ Egypt asaase do. 57Na aman nyinara baa Josef hɔ wɔ Egypt bɔtɔɔ eburow; osiandɛ ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ asaase nyinara do.

Title: GYENESIS 42
Content:
Josef No Nuanom Kɔtɔ Eburow Wɔ Egypt
1Afei Jakob tsee dɛ eburow wɔ Egypt, na ɔsee ne mbabanyin no dɛ, ɔyɛ dɛn na hom hwehwɛɛhwɛ hom enyim nkorkor yi? 2 Na ɔsee dɛ, Hom nhwɛ, matse dɛ eburow wɔ Egypt: hom nkɔ hɔ na hom nkɔtɔ bi wɔ hɔ mbrɛ hɛn; ama yaatsena ase, na yeennwu. 3Na Josef no nuanom du no kɔr Egypt dɛ wɔrokɔtɔ eburow; 4na Josef no nua Benjamin dze, Jakob amma ɔannye no nuanom no annkɔ; na ɔsee dɛ, Bɛyɛ na mbusu bi ato no. 5Na Israel ne mba no foraforaa hɔn a wɔbae no hɔn mu baa atɔ; osiandɛ nna ɔkɔm no esi Keenan asaase do. 6Nna Josef na ɔyɛ asaase no do ambrado; ɔno na ɔtɔn edziban ma asaase no do nkorɔfo nyinara: na Josef no nuanom no bae, na wɔbɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze maa no dze hɔn enyim bumboom famu. 7Na Josef hun no nuanom no, ohun hɔn, na ɔyɛɛ noho ɔhɔho wɔ hɔn enyim, na ɔnye hɔn kasaa ebufuw do. Obisaa hɔn dɛ, Hom fi hen bae? Na wɔsee dɛ, Yefi Keenan asaase do bɔtɔɔ edziban. 8Na Josef hun no nuanom no, na hɔn dze, woennhu no. 9 Na Josef kaa daa a ɔsosoo no hɔn ho no, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Hom yɛ akwanserafo; asaase yi n’adagyaw na hom bae bɔhwɛe. 10Na wɔsee no dɛ, Dabida, mo wura, na wo nkowaa bae dɛ wɔrobɔtɔ edziban. 11Hɛn nyinara yɛ nyimpa kor mba; yɛyɛ anokwafo, wo nkowaa nnyɛ akwanserafo bi. 12Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Dabida, na asaase yi n’adagyaw na hom bae bɔhwɛe. 13Na wɔsee dɛ, Wo nkowaa yɛ enuanom duebien, nyimpa baako mba wɔ Keenan asaase do; na hwɛ, ɔkaekyir no mpo wɔ hɛn egya nkyɛn ndɛ ara, na ɔbaako na onnyi hɔ. 14Na Josef see hɔn dɛ, Iyi ntsi na mekaa kyerɛɛ hom dɛ, Hom yɛ akwanserafo no. 15Dza wɔdze bɔsɔ hom ahwɛ nye yi: dɛ Farao tse ase yi hom nnkefi ha akɔ, gyedɛ hom nua kakraba no aba ha ana. 16Hom nsoma hom mu baako ma ɔnkɛfa hom nua no mbra, na hom dze, wɔdze hom bogu efiadze ama wɔaasɔ hom nsɛm ahwɛ, dɛ nokwar wɔ hom mu anaa: annyɛ dɛm dze a, na ɔno dɛ Farao tse ase yi ampaara hom yɛ akwanserafo. 17Na ɔdze hɔn nyinara koguu efiadze ndaansa. 18Na ne ndaansa no Josef see hɔn dɛ, Hom nyɛ yi, na hom ntsena ase; osiandɛ musuro Nyankopɔn: 19sɛ hom yɛ anokwafo a, ɔno wɔmma wɔnkyekyer hom nuanom mu baako wɔ efiadze mbrɛ hom da yi; na hom dze, hom nkɔ, hom nkɔsoa eburow nkɔ, wɔ hom efiefi kɔm ntsi: 20na wɔnkɛfa hom nua kakraba no mbrɛ me; nna mubohu dɛ hom nsɛm yɛ nokwar, na hom nnkowu. Na wɔyɛɛ dɛm. 21Na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ, Yedzi hɛn nua no ho fɔ ampaara, dɛ hɛnara yehun n’ahohiahia wɔ aber a ɔrototɔ serɛ hɛn no, na yeenntsie; dɛm ntsi na dɛm ahohiahia yi aba hɛn do yi. 22 Na Reuben buaa hɔn dɛ, Mannka annkyerɛ hom dɛ, Mma hom nnyɛ bɔn nntsia abofra no; na hom enntsie? Dɛm ntsi hwɛ, no bɔgyaa na wɔrohwehwɛ yi. 23Nna wonnyim dɛ Josef tse kasa no ase; osiandɛ oyianofo gyina hɔn ntamu. 24Na ɔdaan noho fii hɔn nkyɛn, na okosui; na ɔsanee baa hɔn nkyɛn, na ɔbɛkasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn, na oyii Simeon wɔ hɔn mu, na ɔkyekyeer no wɔ hɔn enyim hɔ.
Josef No Nuanom San Kɔ Keenan
25Na Josef hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa eburow nhyehyɛ hɔn nkotoku amaama, na wɔmfa hɔn nyinara hɔn sika nhyehyɛ hɔn nkotoku mu nkorkor, na wɔmma hɔn kwan mu edziban: na wɔyɛɛ hɔn dɛm. 26Na wɔdze hɔn eburow no soasoaa hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ, na wosii mu fii hɔ. 27Na hɔn mu baako saan no kotoku dɛ ɔrema n’asoasopɔnkɔ edziban wɔ asoɛe no, ohun dɛ ne sika no hyɛ no kotoku ano. 28Na ɔsee no nuanom no dɛ, Wɔdze me sika asan ama me; hwɛ, ɔhyɛ mo kotoku mu: na hɔn akoma tutui, na wɔdze ahopopo sesee hɔnho dɛ, Ebɛnadze na Nyankopɔn ayɛ hɛn yi? 29Na wɔbaa hɔn egya Jakob hɔ wɔ Keenan asaase do, na wɔbɛkaa dza ɔbaa hɔn do nyinara kyerɛɛ no dɛ, 30banyin no a ɔyɛ asaase no wura no nye hɛn kasaa ebufuw do, na ɔfaa hɛn dɛ yɛyɛ ɔman no ho akwanserafo: 31na yɛsee no dɛ, Yɛyɛ anokwafo; na yɛnnyɛ akwanserafo. 32Yɛyɛ enuanom duebien, egyamba; ɔbaako na onnyi hɔ, na ekumaba no wɔ hɛn egya nkyɛn wɔ Keenan asaase do ndɛ ara. 33Na banyin no, mekyerɛ asaase wura no, see hɛn dɛ, Dza medze bohu dɛ hom yɛ anokwafo nye yi; hom ndan hom nuanom mu baako ngya me nkyɛn, na hom mfa eburow nkɔ, wɔ hom efiefi kɔm ntsi, na hom nkɔ hom kwan: 34na hom nkɛfa hom nua kakraba no mbrɛ me: nna mubohu dɛ hom nnyɛ akwanserafo, na dɛ hom yɛ anokwafo: nna mibeyi hom nua no ama hom, na hom edzi gua wɔ asaase yi do. 35Na ɔbaa dɛ wohuehuee hɔn nkotoku mu eburow no, nna nyimpa biara ne sikaboa wɔ no kotoku mu: na aber a hɔn nye hɔn egya hun hɔn sika mboaba no, hɔn akoma tui. 36Ma hɔn egya Jakob see hɔn dɛ, Emi na hom ama mahwer me mba: Josef nnyi hɔ, na Simeon nnyi hɔ, na hom rebɛfa Benjamin so akɔ: iyi nyinara aba mo do. 37Na Reuben kaa kyerɛɛ n’egya dɛ, Sɛ mammfa no ammbrɛ wo bio a, ku me mbabanyin beenu no: fa no hyɛ me nsa, na medze no bɛbrɛ wo bio. 38Na ɔsee dɛ, Me ba nnkɛnye hom akɔ; osiandɛ no nua ewu, na aka no nko: sɛ mbusu bi ba no do wɔ kwan a wɔnam mu rokɔ no mu a, ɔno hom dze mo gon nam awerɛhow mu bɔkɔ nda mu.

Title: GYENESIS 43
Content:
Josef No Nuanom Nye Benjamin Kɔ Egypt
1Na ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ asaase no do. 2Na ɔbaa dɛ, aber a wowiee eburow a wɔdze fi Egypt bae no dzi no, hɔn egya see hɔn dɛ, Hom nkɔ bio, hom nkɔtɔ edziban kakra mbrɛ hɛn. 3Na Juda kaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ, banyin no paa mu ara kaa kyerɛɛ hɛn dɛ, Hom runnhu m’enyim, gyedɛ hom nua no ka hom ho. 4Sɛ ebɛma hɛn nua no nye hɛn akɔ a, nna yɛbɔkɔ na yɛakɔtɔ edziban abrɛ wo: 5na sɛ ennkɛma ɔaka hɛn ho dze a, ɔno yɛronnkɔ: osiandɛ banyin no see hɛn dɛ, Mma hom nnsi m’enyim, gyedɛ hom nua no ka hom ho. 6Na Israel see dɛ, ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom nye me dzi no bɔn dɛm, dɛ hom kaa kyerɛɛ banyin no dɛ hom wɔ nua bi so? 7Na wɔsee dɛ, ɔbarimba no bisaa hɛn ntsɛmara wɔ hɛnara hɛnho, nye hɛn ebusuafo ho, dɛ, Ana hom egya da ho tse ase? Hom wɔ nua bi so a? Na mbrɛ nsɛm yi tse no ara na hɛn so yeyii no ano. Ana hɛn so yenyim dɛ ɔreyɛ na ɔase dɛ, Wɔnkɛfa hom nua no mbra? 8Na Juda see n’egya Israel dɛ, Ma abofra no nye me nkɔ, na yɛbɔsoɛr na yɛakɔ; ama yeenya nkwa, na yeennwu, hɛn nye ɔwo nyina, nye hɛn mbofraba so. 9Mibedzi no ho egyinamu; hwehwɛ no me nsamu: sɛ mammfa no ammbrɛ wo, na mammfa no emmbegyina w’enyim a, ɔno wɔmma asodzi no nka mo kɔn mu daa: 10sɛ yennkyinkyim a nkyɛ ebodu sisei, ɔyɛ dɛn ara a yɛakɔ aba mpɛn ebien. 11Na hɔn egya Israel see hɔn dɛ, Sɛ mbrɛ ɔtse nye yi a, ɔno hom nyɛ yi; hom mfa asaase yi do ndzepa a oye no bi ngu hom ndzɛmba mu, dɛ akyɛdze nkɛma banyin no, akyenkyendur kakra, ewo kakra, eduhuam mɛɛr, nkatse, nye eduadzewa almɔnd, 12na hom mfa sika fofor nkitsa; na sika a wɔdze sanee maa hom a wɔdze hyehyɛɛ hom nkotoku ano no, ɔno so hom mfa nkitsa bio; bi a enyi na oduaa do. 13Hom mfa hom nua no so, na wɔnsoɛr nkɔ banyin no hɔ bio: 14na Otumfo Nyankopɔn mma banyin no nhu hom mbɔbɔr, ama oeegyaa hom nua kor no nye Benjamin ama hom. Na emi dze, sɛ me mba fi me nsa a, nna woefi me nsa.
15Nna nkorɔfo no faa akyɛdze no, na wɔfaa sika fofor siaan ho, nye Benjamin so; na wɔsoɛree kɔr Egypt, na wokegyinaa Josef n’enyim. 16Na aber a Josef hun dɛ Benjamin ka hɔn ho no, ɔsee ne fie somfopanyin no dɛ, Fa mbanyin yi kɔ fie, na koku mbowa, na yɛ edziban; na mbanyin yi nye me bedzidzi ewiaber yi. 17Na panyin no yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Josef see no ara; na ɔdze nkorɔfo no kɔr Josef fie. 18Na nkorɔfo no hɔn akoma tui, osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn akɔ Josef ne fie ntsi; na wɔsee dɛ, Sika a wɔsanee dze hyehyɛɛ hɛn nkotoku mu asɔpɔn no ntsi na wɔdze hɛn aba fie yi; ama ɔaahwehwɛ biribi egyina do, na oeesuo hɛn mu, na ɔaafa hɛn ayɛ nkowaa, nye hɛn nsoasopɔnkɔ. 19Na wopiin Josef ne fie somfopanyin no nkyɛn wɔ fi no n’abowano, 20na wɔsee dɛ, Ao mo wura, yɛbaa ha bɔtɔɔ edziban asɔpɔn no ampa: 21na ɔbaa dɛ, aber a yedur asoɛe, na yɛsansaan hɛn nkotoku ano no, nna, hwɛ, hɛn nyinara hɛn sika hyehyɛ hɛn nkotoku ano, hɛn sika mbrɛ ɔtow ara pɛ: na yɛdze asan aba. 22Na yɛdze sika fofor so aba a yɛdze robɔtɔ edziban: yennyim nyia ɔdze hɛn sika no hyehyɛɛ hɛn nkotoku mu. 23Na ɔsee dɛ, Asomdwee nka hom, mma hom nnsuro: hom Nyankopɔn, nye hom egya ne Nyankopɔn, na ɔama hom ehutudze wɔ hom nkotoku mu: me nsa kaa hom sika no. Na okeyii Simeon brɛɛ hɔn. 24Na banyin no dze nkorɔfo no kɔr Josef fie, na ɔmaa hɔn nsu, na wɔhohoor hɔn anan ho; na ɔmaa hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ no edziban. 25Na wɔyɛɛ akyɛdze no krado dze tweɔɔn Josef ne mbae a ɔbaa ewiaber no: osiandɛ wɔtsee dɛ woribedzidzi wɔ hɔ. 26Na Josef baa fie no, wɔdze akyɛdze a okitsa hɔn nsamu no kɔr dan mu kɛmaa no, na wɔkɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze wɔ famu maa no. 27Na obisaa hɔn honam mu, na ɔsee dɛ, Ana hom egya akɔdaa a hom kaa no ho asɛm no, no ho ye? Ana ɔda ho tse ase? 28Na wɔsee dɛ, W’akowaa hɛn egya no ho ye, ɔda ho tse ase. Na wɔbɔɔ hɔn tsir adze, na wɔkotoow no. 29Na ɔmaa n’enyiwa do, na ohun no nua Benjamin, ne na ba no, na obisaa dɛ, Ana hom nua kuma a hom kaa no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ me no, ɔno nye yi a? Na ɔsee dɛ, Nyankopɔn nhyira wo, me ba. 30Na Josef no ho hiahiaa no; osiandɛ ne yamu hyehyee no wɔ no nua no ho; na ɔhwehwɛɛ beebi a obosuma esu; na ɔkɔr ne pia mu, na okosui wɔ hɔ. 31Na ɔhohoor n’enyim, na opuei; na ɔhyɛɛ noho do, na ɔsee dɛ, Wɔmfa edziban mbesisi hɔ. 32Na wɔdze ɔnoara nedze sii fa, na wɔdze hɔndze sisii fa, na wɔdze Egyptfo a wɔnye no dzidzi no hɔndze sisii fa; osiandɛ Egyptfo nnye Hebriwfo nndzidzi; na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma Egyptfo. 33Na wɔtsenatsenaa n’enyim, abakan no dɛ mbrɛ ne panyin tse, nye ekumaba no dɛ mbrɛ n’ekumaba tse: na ɔyɛɛ nkorɔfo no nwanwa wɔ hɔn mu. 34Na oyiyii edziban ma wɔdze fii n’enyim maa hɔn: na Benjamin dze n’edziban no boor hɔn nyinara hɔndze do mpɛn enum. Na wɔnomee, na hɔn nyinara hɔn enyi gyee.

Title: GYENESIS 44
Content:
Josef No Dwetɛ Kɔɔpow
1Na Josef hyɛɛ ne fie somfo no dɛ, Fa edziban dodowara a nkorɔfo no botum asoa hyehyɛ hɔn nkotoku mu, na fa nyimpa biara ne sika hyɛ no kotoku ano. 2Na fa mo kɔɔpow no, mekyerɛ me dwetɛ kɔɔpow no, hyɛ hɔn mu kakraba no no kotoku mu, nye n’eburow sika no. Na ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Josef kae no ara. 3Enyim tsetsewee ara na wogyaa nkorɔfo no kwan, hɔn nye hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ. 4Na wofii kurow no mu kɔree, na wonnyae nndur ekyirekyir no, Josef see ne somfo no dɛ, Soɛr, tsiw nkorɔfo no; na sɛ eto hɔn a, se hɔn dɛ, ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom dze bɔn etua papa kaw yi? 5Ana nnyɛ iyi na mo wura nom ano, na ɔdze hyɛ nkɔm ma ɔba mu no bi? Hom ayɛ bɔn dɛ hom ayɛ dɛm adze yi. 6Na ɔtoo hɔn, na ɔkaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ hɔn. 7Na wɔsee no dɛ, ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mo wura ka nsɛm a ɔtse dɛm yi? Nyankopɔn mpa ngu dɛ wo nkowaa bɛyɛ dɛm adze yi. 8Hwɛ, sika a yehun no hɛn nkotoku mu no, yɛdze sanee fii Keenan asaase do brɛɛ wo bio: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na yebowia dwetɛ anaa sika wɔ wo wura ne fie? 9Wo nkowaa hɛn mu biara a ibohu no wɔ no hɔ no, ma onwu, na hɛn so yɛbɛyɛ mo wura nkowaa. 10Na ɔsee dɛ, Nna afei wɔmma ɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ hom aka yi ara: nyia wobohu no no hɔ no ɔbɛyɛ m’akowaa; na hom dze, hom nndzi so. 11Nna wɔyɛɛ no ntsɛm, na nyimpa biara soɛɛ no kotoku too famu, na nyimpa biara saan no kotoku ano. 12Na ɔhwehwɛe, ofitsi panyin no do, na ɔdze kɛpeem kakraba no do: na wohun kɔɔpow no wɔ Benjamin no kotoku no mu. 13Nna wosunsuaan hɔn ntar mu, na obiara dze n’adze soaa n’asoasopɔnkɔ, na wɔsanee kɔr kurow no mu. 14Na Juda nye no nuanom no baa Josef fie; nna ɔda ho wɔ hɔ: na wɔhwehwee famu wɔ n’enyim. 15Na Josef see hɔn dɛ, Ebɛnadze na hom ayɛ yi? Ana hom nnyim dɛ nyimpa a ɔtse dɛ emi yi mubotum dɛ mehyɛ nkɔm ma ɔba mu bi a? 16Na Juda see dɛ, Yɛnse mo wura dɛn? Yɛnka dɛn anaadɛ yerudua dɛn asan hɛnho? Nyankopɔn eyi wo nkowaa hɛn emumuyɛ edzi: hwɛ, yɛyɛ mo wura no nkowaa, hɛn nye nyia wohun kɔɔpow no wɔ ne nsamu nyinara. 17Na Josef see dɛ, Nyankopɔn mpa ngu dɛ mebɛyɛ dɛm: nyia woehu kɔɔpow no wɔ ne nsamu no, ɔnoara na ɔbɛyɛ m’akowaa; na hom dze, hom nkɔ hom egya nkyɛn wɔ asomdwee mu.
Juda Serɛ Ma Benjamin
18Nna Juda piin Josef nkyɛn, na ɔsee dɛ, Ao mo wura, meserɛ wo, ma w’akowaa nka asɛm kor wɔ mo wura n’asomu, na mma wo bo mmfuw w’akowaa: osiandɛ tserɛ woara nye Farao. 19Mo wura bisaa no nkowaa dɛ, Ana hom wɔ egya, anaa nua bi? 20Na yebuaa mo wura dɛ, Yɛwɔ egya, akɔdaa bi, na no nkɔdaa ba kakraba bi; na no nua ewu na ne ba a aka ara nye no nko, na n’egya dɔ no. 21Na esee wo nkowaa dɛ, Wɔnkɛfa no mbrɛ me, ma monhwɛ no. 22Na yɛsee mo wura dɛ, Abofra no fi n’egya nkyɛn a ɔnnkɛyɛ: na sɛ ofi n’egya nkyɛn a, n’egya bowu. 23Na esee wo nkowaa dɛ, Gyedɛ hom nua kakraba no nye hom ba, ɔno hom nnkohu m’enyim bio. 24Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛkɔr w’akowaa, m’egya nkyɛn no, yɛkaa mo wura ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no. 25Na hɛn egya see dɛ, Hom nkɔ bio nkɔtɔ edziban kakra mbrɛ hɛn. 26Na yɛsee dɛ, Yɛkɔ a ɔnnkɛyɛ: gyedɛ hɛn nua kakraba no ka hɛn ho, ɔno yɛbɔkɔ: osiandɛ sɛ hɛn nua kakraba no nnka hɛn ho a, ɔno yennkohu banyin no n’enyim. 27Na w’akowaa, m’egya no see hɛn dɛ, Homara hom nyim dɛ me yer woo mba beenu maa me: 28na baako fii me nkyɛn kɔree, na mesee dɛ, Ampaara wɔatsetsew no mu, na munnhun no ara na ɔdze ebodu ndɛ yi: 29na sɛ hom yi oyi so wɔ me nkyɛn, na mbusu bi ba no do a, ɔno hom dze mo gon nam awerɛhow mu bɔkɔ nda mu. 30Dɛm ntsi afei sɛ mokɔ w’akowaa, m’egya ne nkyɛn, na sɛ abofra no nnka hɛn ho a, ɔnam dɛ n’akoma da abofra no ho dodow ntsi, 31sɛ ohu dɛ abofra no nnka hɛn ho a, ɔno obowu: nna wo nkowaa dze w’akowaa, hɛn egya no, no gon nam awerɛhow mu akɔ nda mu. 32Na w’akowaa midzii abofra no ho egyinamu maa m’egya dɛ, Sɛ mammfa no mammbrɛ wo a, ɔno mibedzi so wɔ m’egya n’enyim daa. 33Dɛm ntsi afei, meserɛ wo, ma w’akowaa mindzi abofra no ananmu menyɛ mo wura ɔsomfo; na ma abofra no nye no nuanom nkɔ. 34Na mibesi no dɛn na makɔ m’egya nkyɛn, ber a abofra no nnka mo ho? Bɛyɛ na mehu mbusu a ɔbɛba m’egya no do.

Title: GYENESIS 45
Content:
Josef Da Noho Edzi Kyerɛ No Nuanom
1 Nna afei Josef hyɛ noho do a ɔnnyɛ yie, wɔ hɔn a wogyinagyina ne nkyɛn no nyinara hɔn enyim; na ɔkaa mu dɛ, Wɔmma nkorɔfo nyinara mfi me nkyɛn mfi. Na aber a Josef riyi noho edzi akyerɛ no nuanom no, nna obiara nngyina ne nkyɛn. 2Na ɔmaa ne ndze do sui: na Egyptfo no tsee, na Farao fiefo tsee. 3Na Josef see no nuanom no dɛ, Emi nye Josef; ana m’egya da ho tse ase? Na no nuanom no enntum emmbua no; osiandɛ hɔn ho popoe wɔ n’enyim. 4Na Josef see no nuanom no dɛ, Meserɛ hom, wompin me nkyɛn. Na wopinii. Na ɔsee dɛ, Emi nye hom nua Josef a hom tɔɔn no baa Egypt no. 5Na afei mma ɔnnyɛ hom yaw, na mma hom bo mmfufuw hom ho so, dɛ hom tɔɔn me baa ha: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn na ɔsomaa me ma midzii hom enyim kan, ama maabɛgye nkwa. 6Osiandɛ ɔkɔm esi asaase yi do mfe ebien nye yi: na mfe enum so aka a adɔw nye buber so nnyi mu. 7Na Nyankopɔn somaa me ma midzii hom enyim kan ama maabɔkora edzinkaa bi ama hom wɔ asaase do, na medze ɔgye kɛsenara agye hom nkwa. 8Dɛm ntsi afei, nnyɛ hom bi na wɔsomaa me wɔ ha, na Nyankopɔn a: na ɔayɛ me Farao n’egya, na ne fi nyinara wura na Egypt asaase nyinara do panyin. 9 Hom nka hom ho nkɔ m’egya hɔ, na wɔnkɛse no dɛ, Mbrɛ wo ba Josef se nye yi, Nyankopɔn ayɛ me Egypt nyinara wura: bra me nkyɛn, mma nnkyinkyim: 10Na bɛtsena Gosen asaase do, na bɛn me, ɔwo, nye wo mba, nye wo mbanananom, nye wo nguan, nye w’anantwi, nye dza ewɔ nyinara: 11na mobɔhwɛ wo wɔ hɔ; na aka ɔkɔm mfe enum so; bɛyɛ na ehia, ɔwo, nye wo fidua, nye dza ewɔ nyinara. 12Na hwɛ, hom enyiwa tua, na mo nua Benjamin so n’enyiwa tua, dɛ m’ano na ɔrekasa kyerɛ hom yi. 13Na hom nkɛka m’enyimnyam a mowɔ no wɔ Egypt nyinara no ho asɛm nkyerɛ m’egya, na dza hom ehu no nyinara; na hom nyɛ ntsɛm nkɛfa m’egya mbra ha. 14Na ɔbaar no nua Benjamin no kɔn, na osui; na Benjamin so sui wɔ no kɔn ho. 15Na ɔfefeew no nuanom nyinara hɔn ano, na ɔdzedze hɔn mu sui: na n’ekyir no no nuanom no nye no kasae.
16Na wɔtsee nka wɔ Farao fie dɛ, Josef no nuanom aba: na Farao nye no nkowaa enyi gyee papa. 17Na Farao see Josef dɛ, Se wo nuanom no dɛ, Iyi na hom nyɛ: hom mfa ndzɛmba nsoasoa hom mbowa no, na hom nkɔ, hom nsan nkɔ Keenan asaase do; 18na hom nkɛfa hom egya nye hom fifo, na hom mbra me nkyɛn: na mebɛma hom Egypt asaase no mu dza oye, na hom bedzi asaase no do ndzepa. 19Afei se hɔn dɛ, iyi na hom nyɛ; hom mfa ntseaseanam wɔ Egypt asaase do nkɛfa hom mbofraba, nye hom yernom na hom egya ma wɔmbra. 20Eso mma hom mma hom ndzɛmba ho nnhia hom; na dza oye wɔ Egypt asaase do nyinara yɛ homdze. 21Na Israel ne mba no yɛɛ dɛm: na Josef maa hɔn ntseaseanam, dɛ mbrɛ Farao hyɛe no ara, na ɔmaa hɔn kwan mu edziban. 22Ɔmaa hɔn nyinara ntar nsakyerho nkorkor; na Benjamin dze, ɔmaa no ndwetɛbona ahaasa, nye ntar nsakyerho enum. 23Na dza ɔdze kɛmaa n’egya nye yi; nsoasopɔnkɔ du a wɔsoso Egypt ndzɛmba pa, nye nsoasopɔnkɔber du a wɔsoso eburow, nye boodoo, nye edzidzidze a n’egya bedzi no wɔ kwan mu. 24Nna ogyaa no nuanom no kwan, na wosii mu na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Hom nhwɛ mma hom aannka yaw wɔ kwan mu. 25Na wofii Egypt kɔree, na wɔbaa hɔn egya Jakob nkyɛn wɔ Keenan asaase do. 26Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ, Josef da ho tse ase, na ɔno nye Egypt asaase nyinara do panyin. Na bobor boor no, osiandɛ ɔanngye hɔn enndzi. 27Na wɔkaa Josef ne nsɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn no nyinara kyerɛɛ no: na aber a ohun ntseaseanam a Josef maa wɔdze kɔree dɛ wɔmfa nkɛfa no no, nna hɔn egya Jakob n’akoma tɔɔ ne yamu: 28na Israel see dɛ, ɔdɔɔ so ma me; me ba Josef da ho tse ase: mobɔkɔ mekohu no ana mewu.

Title: GYENESIS 46
Content:
Jakob Na N’ebusuafo Kɔ Egypt
1Na Israel faa dza ɔwɔ nyinara sii mu, na ɔbaa Beer-seba, na ɔbɔɔ afɔr maa n’egya Isaak ne Nyankopɔn. 2Na Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ Israel wɔ anafua nyikyerɛ mu, na ɔfrɛɛ no, Jakob, Jakob, na ɔsee dɛ, Emi nye yi. 3Na ɔsee dɛ, Emi nye Nyankopɔn, w’egya ne Nyankopɔn: mma nnsuro dɛ ebɔkɔ Egypt; na mebɛyɛ wo ɔman kɛse wɔ hɔ: 4menye wo bɔkɔ Egypt; na medze wo efi hɔ aba bio so ampaara: na Josef dze n’abaw mu na ibowu ada. 5Na Jakob soɛree fii Beer-seba: na Israel ne mba no twuuw hɔn egya Jakob, nye hɔn mbofraba, nye hɔn yernom, wɔ ntseaseanam a Farao maa wɔdze baa dɛ wɔmfa mbɛfa no no mu. 6 Na wɔfaa hɔn mbowa, nye hɔn ahodze a wonyaa no wɔ Keenan asaase do no, na wɔbaa Egypt, Jakob nye n’asefo nyinara a wɔka no ho: 7ne mbabanyin, nye ne mbabanyin hɔn mbabanyin ka no ho, ne mbabaa nye ne mbabanyin hɔn mbabaa, nye n’asefo nyinara na wɔka no ho na ɔnye hɔn baa Egypt.
8Na Israel ne mba a wɔbaa Egypt no hɔn edzin nye yi, Jakob nye ne mbabanyin: Jakob n’abakan Reuben. 9Na Reuben ne mbabanyin; Hanok, Pallu, Hezron, nye Karmi. 10Na Simeon ne mbabanyin; Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Zohar, nye Saul, Keenannyi ɔbaa bi ne ba no. 11Na Levi ne mbabanyin; Gerson, Kohat, nye Merari. 12Na Juda ne mbabanyin; Er, Onan, Sela, Perez, nye Zera: mbom Er nye Onan dze, wowuu Keenan asaase do.
